trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control is a range that has a unique name, exposes events, and can be bound to data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件是一个具有唯一名称的范围，它可以公开事件并绑定到数据。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NamedRange Control](/visualstudio/vsto/namedrange-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[NamedRange 控件](/visualstudio/vsto/namedrange-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: Usage
trans-unit.target: 用法

trans-unit.source: Activates a single-cell <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 激活单个单元格 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件。

trans-unit.source: To select a range of cells, use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Select%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要选择的一个单元范围，使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Select%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The comment text.
trans-unit.target: 注释文本。

trans-unit.source: Adds a comment to the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 向 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件添加注释。

trans-unit.source: Comments can only be added to <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> controls that consist of a single cell.
trans-unit.target: 仅可以将备注添加到<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>包含的单个单元格的控件。

trans-unit.source: You cannot add a comment if the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> control has more than one cell.
trans-unit.target: 如果不能添加注释<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>控件具有多个单元格。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.AddComment%2A> method to add the comment "This is Martha's range."
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.AddComment%2A>方法添加批注"This is Martha 的范围"。

trans-unit.source: to a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> control that includes cell A1.
trans-unit.target: 到<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>包括 A1 单元格的控件。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines whether text is automatically indented when the text alignment in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control is set to equal distribution either horizontally or vertically.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值确定在将 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件中的文本对齐方式设置为在水平或垂直方向均匀分布时文本是否自动缩进。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if text is automatically indented when the text alignment in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control is set to equal distribution either horizontally or vertically; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在将 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件中的文本对齐方式设置为在水平或垂直方向均匀分布时文本会自动缩进，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: To set text alignment to equal distribution, you can set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range.VerticalAlignment%2A> property to <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlVAlign.xlVAlignDistributed> when the value of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range.Orientation%2A> property is <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlOrientation.xlVertical>, and you can set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range.HorizontalAlignment%2A> property to <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlHAlign.xlHAlignDistributed> when the value of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range.Orientation%2A> property is <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlOrientation.xlHorizontal>.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置文本对齐方式为均匀分布，可以设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range.VerticalAlignment%2A>属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlVAlign.xlVAlignDistributed>时的值<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range.Orientation%2A>属性是<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlOrientation.xlVertical>，还可以设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range.HorizontalAlignment%2A>属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlHAlign.xlHAlignDistributed>时的值<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range.Orientation%2A>属性是<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlOrientation.xlHorizontal>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the range reference for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件的范围引用。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the range reference of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control in R1C1-stye or A1-style notation.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件的用 R1C1 或 A1 样式表示法表示的范围引用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Address%2A> property is intended to be used with the following parameters.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Address%2A>属性应与以下参数一起使用。

trans-unit.source: Parameter
trans-unit.target: 参数

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: `true` to return the row as an absolute reference.
trans-unit.target: `true` 绝对引用的形式返回行。

trans-unit.source: The default value is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 `true`。

trans-unit.source: `true` to return the column as an absolute reference.
trans-unit.target: `true` 若要为的绝对引用返回列。

trans-unit.source: The default value is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 `true`。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlReferenceStyle> values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlReferenceStyle> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: `true` to return an external reference; `false` to return a local reference.
trans-unit.target: `true` 若要返回的外部引用;`false`返回的本地引用。

trans-unit.source: The default value is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 `false`。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range> that defines the starting point.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range> ，它定义的起始点。

trans-unit.source: If `RowAbsolute` and `ColumnAbsolute` are `false`, and `ReferenceStyle` is <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlReferenceStyle.xlR1C1>, you must include a starting point for the relative reference.
trans-unit.target: 如果`RowAbsolute`和`ColumnAbsolute`是`false`，和`ReferenceStyle`是<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlReferenceStyle.xlR1C1>，必须包含一个起始点，相对的引用。

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to use <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Address%2A> without specifying any parameters, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Address%2A> will get a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange_AddressType> object that is part of the Visual Studio infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 如果你尝试使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Address%2A>而不指定任何参数，<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Address%2A>将获取<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange_AddressType>对象，是 Visual Studio 基础结构的一部分和不应在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: If the reference contains more than one cell, `RowAbsolute` and `ColumnAbsolute` apply to all rows and columns.
trans-unit.target: 如果引用包含多个单元格，`RowAbsolute`和`ColumnAbsolute`适用于所有行和列。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> and then displays the address of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> in four formats.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>，然后显示的地址<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>以四种格式。

trans-unit.source: This version is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此版本用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: This version is for an application-level add-in.
trans-unit.target: 此版本用于针对应用程序级外接程序。

trans-unit.source: Gets the range reference for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control in the language of the user.
trans-unit.target: 以用户的语言获取 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件的范围引用。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the range reference of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control in the language of the user and in R1C1-stye or A1-style notation.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件的采用用户语言并用 R1C1 或 A1 样式表示法表示的范围引用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.AddressLocal%2A> property is intended to be used with the following parameters.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.AddressLocal%2A>属性应与以下参数一起使用。

trans-unit.source: Parameter
trans-unit.target: 参数

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: `true` to return the row as an absolute reference.
trans-unit.target: `true` 绝对引用的形式返回行。

trans-unit.source: The default value is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 `true`。

trans-unit.source: `true` to return the column as an absolute reference.
trans-unit.target: `true` 若要为的绝对引用返回列。

trans-unit.source: The default value is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 `true`。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlReferenceStyle> values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlReferenceStyle> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: `true` to return an external reference; `false` to return a local reference.
trans-unit.target: `true` 若要返回的外部引用;`false`返回的本地引用。

trans-unit.source: The default value is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 `false`。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range> that defines the starting point.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range> ，它定义的起始点。

trans-unit.source: If `RowAbsolute` and `ColumnAbsolute` are `false`, and `ReferenceStyle` is <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlReferenceStyle.xlR1C1>, you must include a starting point for the relative reference.
trans-unit.target: 如果`RowAbsolute`和`ColumnAbsolute`是`false`，和`ReferenceStyle`是<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlReferenceStyle.xlR1C1>，必须包含一个起始点，相对的引用。

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to use <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.AddressLocal%2A> without specifying any parameters, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.AddressLocal%2A> will get a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange_AddressLocalType> object that is part of the Visual Studio infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 如果你尝试使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.AddressLocal%2A>而不指定任何参数，<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.AddressLocal%2A>将获取<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange_AddressLocalType>对象，是 Visual Studio 基础结构的一部分和不应在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: If the reference contains more than one cell, `RowAbsolute` and `ColumnAbsolute` apply to all rows and columns.
trans-unit.target: 如果引用包含多个单元格，`RowAbsolute`和`ColumnAbsolute`适用于所有行和列。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> and then displays the address of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> in four formats.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>，然后显示的地址<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>以四种格式。

trans-unit.source: If the example is run on a system using German language support, the example will display the address strings "$A$2", "$A2", "Z2S2", and "Z[-1]S[-1]".
trans-unit.target: 如果示例使用德语语言支持的系统上运行的该示例将显示的地址字符串"$A$ 2"，"$A2"、"Z2S2"和"Z-[1] S [-1]"。

trans-unit.source: This version is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此版本用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: This version is for an application-level add-in.
trans-unit.target: 此版本用于针对应用程序级外接程序。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the following <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlFilterAction" /> values:
trans-unit.target: 可以是下列 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlFilterAction" /> 值之一：

trans-unit.source: The criteria range.
trans-unit.target: 条件范围。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, there are no criteria.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则没有任何条件。

trans-unit.source: The destination range for the copied rows if <c>Action</c> is <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlFilterAction.xlFilterCopy" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Action 为 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlFilterAction.xlFilterCopy" />，则为复制行的目标范围<c></c>。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this argument is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 否则，将忽略此参数。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to filter unique records only; <see langword="false" /> to filter all records that meet the criteria.
trans-unit.target: 如果仅筛选唯一的记录，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果筛选所有符合条件的记录，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Filters or copies data from a list based on a criteria range.
trans-unit.target: 基于条件范围从列表筛选或复制数据。

trans-unit.source: If the initial selection is a single cell, that cell's current region is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果初始选择为单个单元格，则使用该单元格的当前区域。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets integer values in the range of cells from A1 through A5 and then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.AdvancedFilter%2A> method to filter and copy the values to the range of cells starting at B1.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例从通过 A5 A1 单元格的范围内设置整数值，然后使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.AdvancedFilter%2A>方法筛选，并将值复制到的单元格 B1 开始的范围。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Performs a writeback operation for all edited cells in a named range based on an OLAP data source.
trans-unit.target: 基于 OLAP 数据源为命名范围内的所有已编辑单元格执行写回操作。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.AllocateChanges%2A> method will execute an UPDATE CUBE statement for all changes made in the named range since the last apply changes operation was committed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.AllocateChanges%2A>方法将执行 UPDATE CUBE 语句的命名范围中最后一个应用的更改操作已提交以来的所有更改。

trans-unit.source: This method generates a run-time error if it is executed on a range based on a non-OLAP data source.
trans-unit.target: 如果范围基于非 OLAP 数据源上执行，则此方法会生成运行时错误。

trans-unit.source: This method appears in IntelliSense in Excel 2007 projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 此方法将显示在 IntelliSense Excel 2007 项目中面向[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: However, this method cannot be used in Excel 2007 projects.
trans-unit.target: 但是，不能在 Excel 2007 项目中使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: This method is used in an Excel 2007 project.
trans-unit.target: 在 Excel 2007 项目中使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control can be edited on a protected worksheet.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否可以在受保护的工作表上编辑 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control can be edited on a protected worksheet; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以在受保护的工作表上编辑 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Application" /> that represents the creator of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Application" /> 控件的创建者的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Application" /> that represents the creator of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Application" /> 控件的创建者的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example gets the name and version of the application that contains the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> and displays the information in a message box.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例获取的名称和版本的应用程序包含<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>并在消息框中显示的信息。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: An array of the names to be applied.
trans-unit.target: 要应用的名称的数组。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, all names on the sheet are applied to the range.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则会向该范围应用此表中的所有名称。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to replace references with names, regardless of the reference types of either the names or references; <see langword="false" /> to replace absolute references only with absolute names, relative references only with relative names, and mixed references only with mixed names.
trans-unit.target: 如果无论引用类型为名称还是引用，都将引用替换为名称，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果只是将绝对引用替换为绝对名称，将相对引用替换为相对名称，将混合引用替换为混合名称，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to use the names of row and column ranges that contain the specified range if names for the range cannot be found; <see langword="false" /> to ignore the <c>OmitColumn</c> and <c>OmitRow</c> arguments.
trans-unit.target: 如果在找不到指定范围的名称时使用包含该范围的行和列范围的名称，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果忽略 <c>OmitColumn</c> 和 <c>OmitRow</c> 参数，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to replace the entire reference with the row-oriented name.
trans-unit.target: 如果将整个引用替换为面向行的名称，则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The column-oriented name can be omitted only if the referenced cell is in the same column as the formula and is within a row-oriented named range.
trans-unit.target: 只有当引用的单元格与公式在同一列中，而且位于面向行的命名范围中时，才能省略面向列的名称。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to replace the entire reference with the column-oriented name.
trans-unit.target: 如果将整个引用替换为面向列的名称，则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The row-oriented name can be omitted only if the referenced cell is in the same row as the formula and is within a column-oriented named range.
trans-unit.target: 只有当引用的单元格与公式在同一行中，而且位于面向列的命名范围中时，才能省略面向行的名称。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines which range name is listed first when a cell reference is replaced by a row-oriented and column-oriented range name.
trans-unit.target: 确定在将单元格引用替换为面向行和面向列的范围名称时首先列出的范围名称。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of these <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlApplyNamesOrder" /> constants:
trans-unit.target: 可以是下列 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlApplyNamesOrder" /> 常数之一：

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to replace the definitions of the names in <c>Names</c> and also replace the definitions of the last names that were defined; <see langword="false" /> to replace the definitions of the names in <c>Names</c> only.
trans-unit.target: 如果替换 <c>Names</c> 中名称的定义，还替换上次定义的名称的定义，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果仅替换 <c>Names</c> 中名称的定义，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Applies names to the cells in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 向 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件中的单元格应用名称。

trans-unit.source: You can use the `Array` function to create the list of names for the `Names` argument.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用`Array`函数来创建的名称列表`Names`自变量。

trans-unit.source: If you want to apply names to the entire sheet, use `Cells.ApplyNames`.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要应用于整个表的名称，使用`Cells.ApplyNames`。

trans-unit.source: You cannot "unapply" names; to delete names, use the `Delete` method.
trans-unit.target: 你不能"不应用"名称;若要删除名称，使用`Delete`方法。

trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Areas" /> collection that represents all the ranges in a multiple-area selection.

trans-unit.source: The string to complete.
trans-unit.target: 要完成的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets an AutoComplete match from the list.
trans-unit.target: 从列表中获取一个 AutoComplete 匹配。

trans-unit.source: An AutoComplete match from the list.
trans-unit.target: 列表中的 AutoComplete 匹配项。

trans-unit.source: If there is no AutoComplete match or if more than one entry in the list matches the string to complete, this method returns an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有自动完成匹配项，或者在列表中的多个条目与匹配要完成的字符串，此方法将返回空字符串。

trans-unit.source: This method works even if the AutoComplete feature is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 此方法适用即使记忆式键入功能被禁用。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.AutoComplete%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.AutoComplete%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The example first sets the value of cell A1 to the string "Martha lives on a vineyard" and creates a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> control in cell A2.
trans-unit.target: 该示例首先将 A1 单元格的值设置为字符串"上 vineyard Martha 生活"，创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>A2 单元格中的控件。

trans-unit.source: The example then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.AutoComplete%2A> method to obtain an AutoComplete match from the substring "Ma" and places the matching value in the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>.
trans-unit.target: 然后该示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.AutoComplete%2A>方法来获取记忆式键入功能与来自"Ma"的子字符串，并将中的匹配值<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: The offset of the field on which you want to base the filter (from the left of the list; the leftmost field is field 1 (one)).
trans-unit.target: 要使筛选器基于的字段的偏移量（从列表的左边算起；最左边的字段为字段 1（一））。

trans-unit.source: The criteria (a string; for example, "101").
trans-unit.target: 条件（一个字符串；例如“101”）。

trans-unit.source: Use "=" to find blank fields, or use "<>" to find nonblank fields.
trans-unit.target: 使用“=”查找空白字段，或使用“<>”查找非空白字段。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, the criteria is <see langword="All" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则条件为 <see langword="All" />。

trans-unit.source: If <c>Operator</c> is <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlAutoFilterOperator.xlTop10Items" />, <c>Criteria1</c> specifies the number of items (for example, "10").
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>Operator</c> 为 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlAutoFilterOperator.xlTop10Items" />，则 <c>Criteria1</c> 指定项数（如“10”）。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the following <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlAutoFilterOperator" /> constants:
trans-unit.target: 可以是下列 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlAutoFilterOperator" /> 常量之一：

trans-unit.source: Use <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlAutoFilterOperator.xlAnd" /> and <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlAutoFilterOperator.xlOr" /> with <c>Criteria1</c> and <c>Criteria2</c> to construct compound criteria.
trans-unit.target: 在 <c>Criteria1</c> 和 <c>Criteria2</c> 中使用 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlAutoFilterOperator.xlAnd" /> 和 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlAutoFilterOperator.xlOr" /> 来构造复合条件。

trans-unit.source: The second criteria (a string).
trans-unit.target: 第二个条件（字符串）。

trans-unit.source: Used with <c>Criteria1</c> and <c>Operator</c> to construct compound criteria.
trans-unit.target: 与 <c>Criteria1</c> 和 <c>Operator</c> 一起用于构造复合条件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to display the AutoFilter drop-down arrow for the filtered field; <see langword="false" /> to hide the AutoFilter drop-down arrow for the filtered field.
trans-unit.target: 如果对所筛选字段显示自动筛选下拉箭头，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果对所筛选字段隐藏自动筛选下拉箭头，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> by default.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Filters a list using the AutoFilter.
trans-unit.target: 使用“自动筛选”筛选列表。

trans-unit.source: If you omit all the arguments, this method simply toggles the display of the AutoFilter drop-down arrows in the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> control.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略的自变量，则此方法只需切换的中的自动筛选下拉箭头显示<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>控件。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Changes the width of the columns or the height of the rows in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control to achieve the best fit.
trans-unit.target: 更改 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件中的列宽或行高以实现最佳匹配。

trans-unit.source: One unit of column width is equal to the width of one character in the Normal style.
trans-unit.target: 一个单元的列宽度等于正文样式中的一个字符的宽度。

trans-unit.source: Automatically creates an outline for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 自动为 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件创建大纲。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> control is a single cell, Microsoft Office Excel creates an outline for the entire sheet.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>控件为单个单元格，则 Microsoft Office Excel 创建概述整张工作表。

trans-unit.source: The new outline replaces any existing outline.
trans-unit.target: 新的大纲替换任何现有的大纲。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.AutoOutline%2A> method to create an outline for a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> control, and then prompts the user to clear the outline by calling the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.ClearOutline%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.AutoOutline%2A>方法创建的轮廓<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>控制，，然后提示用户通过调用清除该大纲<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.ClearOutline%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control is double-clicked, before the default double-click action.
trans-unit.target: 当在默认的双击操作之前双击 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件时发生。

trans-unit.source: Double-clicking overlapping <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> controls raises the event on each of the controls that overlap.
trans-unit.target: 双击重叠<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>控件引发上每个重叠的控件的事件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> and then populates all the cells with the text `Delete`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>然后填充带文本的所有单元格`Delete`。

trans-unit.source: To test the events, right-click one of the cells to make a border appear around the range, and then double-click one of the cells to clear the range.
trans-unit.target: 若要测试事件，右键单击其中一个单元格，以便在该范围周围出现，然后双击要清除范围的单元格的边框。

trans-unit.source: This version is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此版本用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: This version is for an application-level add-in.
trans-unit.target: 此版本用于针对应用程序级外接程序。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control is right-clicked, before the default right-click action.
trans-unit.target: 当在默认的右击操作之前右击 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件时发生。

trans-unit.source: Right-clicking overlapping <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> controls raises the event on each of the controls that overlap.
trans-unit.target: 右键单击重叠<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>控件引发上每个重叠的控件的事件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> and then populates all the cells with the text `Delete`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>然后填充带文本的所有单元格`Delete`。

trans-unit.source: To test the events, right-click one of the cells to make a border appear around the range, and then double-click one of the cells to clear the range.
trans-unit.target: 若要测试事件，右键单击其中一个单元格，以便在该范围周围出现，然后双击要清除范围的单元格的边框。

trans-unit.source: This version is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此版本用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: This version is for an application-level add-in.
trans-unit.target: 此版本用于针对应用程序级外接程序。

trans-unit.source: The line style for the border.
trans-unit.target: 边框的线型。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the following <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlLineStyle" /> values:
trans-unit.target: 可以是下列 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlLineStyle" /> 值之一：

trans-unit.source: The border weight.
trans-unit.target: 边框的粗细。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the following <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlBorderWeight" /> constants:
trans-unit.target: 可以是下列 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlBorderWeight" /> 常量之一：

trans-unit.source: The border color, as an index into the current color palette or as an <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlColorIndex" /> constant.
trans-unit.target: 边框颜色（作为访问当前调色板的索引或作为 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlColorIndex" /> 常数）。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the following <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlColorIndex" /> constants:
trans-unit.target: 可以是下列 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlColorIndex" /> 常量之一：

trans-unit.source: The border color, as an RGB value.
trans-unit.target: 边框颜色，采用 RGB 值的形式。

trans-unit.source: The theme color, as an index into the current color theme or as an <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlThemeColor" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 主题颜色（作为访问当前颜色主题的索引或作为 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlThemeColor" /> 值）。

trans-unit.source: Adds a border to a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control and sets the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Border.Color" />, <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Border.LineStyle" />, and <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Border.Weight" /> properties for the new border.
trans-unit.target: 向 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件添加一个边框，并设置新边框的 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Border.Color" />、<see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Border.LineStyle" /> 和 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Border.Weight" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: You must specify either `ColorIndex` or `Color`, but not both.
trans-unit.target: 你必须指定`ColorIndex`或`Color`，但不是两者。

trans-unit.source: You can specify either `LineStyle` or `Weight`, but not both.
trans-unit.target: 你可以指定`LineStyle`或`Weight`，但不是两者。

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify either argument, Microsoft Office Excel uses the default line style and weight.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定两个参数，Microsoft Office Excel 将使用默认线条样式和权重。

trans-unit.source: This method outlines the entire range without filling it in.
trans-unit.target: 此方法而不填充概述的整个范围。

trans-unit.source: To set the borders of all the cells, you must set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Borders.Color%2A>, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Borders.LineStyle%2A>, and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Borders.Weight%2A> properties for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Borders> collection.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置的所有单元格的边框，必须设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Borders.Color%2A>， <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Borders.LineStyle%2A>，和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Borders.Weight%2A>属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Borders>集合。

trans-unit.source: To clear the border, you must set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Borders.LineStyle%2A> property to <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlLineStyle.xlLineStyleNone> for all the cells in the range.
trans-unit.target: 若要清除边框，必须设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Borders.LineStyle%2A>属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlLineStyle.xlLineStyleNone>区域中的所有单元格。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Borders" /> collection that represents the borders of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Borders" /> 控件的边框 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Borders" /> collection that represents the borders of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Borders" /> 控件的边框的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 集合。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Borders%2A> property to draw double lines for the border of a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>, and it uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Interior%2A> property to color the interior of a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> green.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Borders%2A>属性绘制的边框的双线<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>，并使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Interior%2A>属性进行着色的内部<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>绿色。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Calculates the values of cells in a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 计算 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件中单元格的值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Formula%2A> property of a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> control to calculate the sum of cells A1 through A5, uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.FormulaHidden%2A> property to hide the formula, and then calls the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Calculate%2A> method to calculate the sum of the cells and place the sum in cell A6.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Formula%2A>属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>控件来对其求和的单元格 A1 到 A5，使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.FormulaHidden%2A>属性来隐藏公式，并随后将调用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Calculate%2A>方法来对其求和的单元格和将其放在单元格中 A6。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Calculates a specific range of cells.
trans-unit.target: 计算某个特定范围的单元格。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the calculation of a specific range of cells.
trans-unit.target: 表示对特定范围单元格进行计算的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.CalculateRowMajorOrder%2A> method calculates the specified range cell by cell, from its top-left corner to its bottom-right corner in row-major order.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.CalculateRowMajorOrder%2A>方法计算指定的范围逐单元格，从其左上角到按行优先顺序其右下角。

trans-unit.source: This is the same process that is used by Excel 2000 and earlier versions to calculate a range.
trans-unit.target: 这是通过 Excel 2000 和更早版本中用于计算一系列的相同过程。

trans-unit.source: The following code example causes Excel to calculate the specified named range.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例会导致 Excel 来计算指定的命名的范围。

trans-unit.source: To run this code example, add a named range control that spans one or more cells that contain some formulas and name it `myFormulaRange`.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when something changes in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> control is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction.

trans-unit.source: This event does not occur when cells in a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> control change during a recalculation.
trans-unit.target: 此事件不会发生时中的单元格<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>控件更改重新计算过程。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Characters" /> object that represents a range of characters within the text of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Characters" /> 对象，该对象表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件文本中某一范围的字符。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Characters" /> object that represents a range of characters within the text of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Characters" /> 对象，表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件文本中某一范围的字符。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Characters%2A> property is intended to be used with the following parameters.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Characters%2A>属性应与以下参数一起使用。

trans-unit.source: Parameter
trans-unit.target: 参数

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The first character to be returned.
trans-unit.target: 要返回的第一个字符。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is either 1 or omitted, this property returns a range of characters starting with the first character.
trans-unit.target: 如果此参数为 1 或被省略，则此属性将返回一系列字符开头的第一个字符。

trans-unit.source: The number of characters to be returned.
trans-unit.target: 要返回的字符数。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, this property returns the remainder of the string (everything after the `Start` character).
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则此属性返回字符串的其余部分 (之后的所有内容`Start`字符)。

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to use <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Characters%2A> without specifying any parameters, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Characters%2A> will get a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange_CharactersType> object that is part of the Visual Studio infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 如果你尝试使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Characters%2A>而不指定任何参数，<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Characters%2A>将获取<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange_CharactersType>对象，是 Visual Studio 基础结构的一部分和不应在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Characters?displayProperty=fullName> object to format characters within a text string.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Characters?displayProperty=fullName>到内的文本字符串的格式字符的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Characters?displayProperty=fullName> object is not a collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Characters?displayProperty=fullName>对象不是一个集合。

trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.target: 然后将它通过使加粗，并将大小设置为 14 更改 word 中的第一个字符。

trans-unit.source: This version is for a document-level customization.

trans-unit.source: This version is for an application-level add-in.
trans-unit.target: 此版本用于针对应用程序级外接程序。

trans-unit.source: Indicates the file name of the custom dictionary to be examined if the word is not found in the main dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 指示在主字典中找不到该单词时要检查的自定义字典的文件名。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, the currently specified dictionary is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则使用当前指定的字典。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to have Microsoft Office Excel ignore words that are all uppercase; <see langword="false" /> to have Excel check words that are all uppercase.
trans-unit.target: 如果让 Microsoft Office Excel 忽略全大写的单词，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果让 Excel 检查全大写的单词，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, the current setting is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则使用当前设置。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to have Excel display a list of suggested alternate spellings when an incorrect spelling is found; <see langword="false" /> to have Excel pause while you input the correct spelling.
trans-unit.target: 如果让 Excel 在找到错误拼写时显示建议的替换拼写的列表，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果让 Excel 在您输入正确的拼写时暂停，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, the current setting is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则使用当前设置。

trans-unit.source: The language of the dictionary being used.
trans-unit.target: 所使用的字典的语言。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoLanguageID" /> values used by the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Core.LanguageSettings.LanguageID(Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoAppLanguageID)" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 可以为 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoLanguageID" /> 属性使用的 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Core.LanguageSettings.LanguageID(Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoAppLanguageID)" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Checks the spelling of text in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 检查 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件中文本的拼写。

trans-unit.source: This form has no return value; Excel displays the **Spelling** dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 此窗体具有无返回值。Excel 显示**拼写**对话框。

trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: Removes all hyperlinks from the specified range.
trans-unit.target: 从指定范围移除所有超链接。

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.ClearHyperlinks%2A> method on the specified range is equivalent to using the **Clear Hyperlinks** command from the **Clear** drop-down list in the **Editing** group of the **Home** tab in Excel.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.ClearHyperlinks%2A>上指定的范围的方法相当于使用**清除超链接**命令**清除**下拉列表中的**编辑**组**主页**在 Excel 中的选项卡。

trans-unit.source: Only hyperlinks will be removed; all other cell content, such as text and formatting will be unaffected.
trans-unit.target: 将删除仅超链接;所有其他单元格内容，例如文本和格式设置不会影响。

trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件的第一个区域中第一列的编号。

trans-unit.source: The number of the first column in the first area of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件中第一个区域内第一列的编号。

trans-unit.source: Column A returns 1, column B returns 2, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 列 A 返回 1，列 B 返回 2，依此类推。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>并使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Column%2A>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Row%2A>属性，以显示第一列数和行中<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: A single cell to compare to the specified range.
trans-unit.target: 一个要与指定的范围进行比较的单元格。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> that represents all the cells whose contents are different from the comparison cell in each column.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" />，它表示每一列中其内容与比较单元格不同的所有单元格。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> that represents all the cells whose contents are different from the comparison cell in each column.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" />，表示内容与每一列中的比较单元格不同的所有单元格。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> and populates cells in the range with two different values.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>并填充具有两个不同值的范围中的单元格。

trans-unit.source: It compares all of the cells in the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> with the value of cell B5, which is 11, and selects the cells with values that do not match.
trans-unit.target: 它比较中的单元格的所有<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>B5 单元格，这是 11 中，并选择具有不匹配的值的单元格的值。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> that represents the one or more columns in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" />，它表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件中的一列或多个列。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> that represents one or more columns in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" />，它表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件中的一列或多个列。

trans-unit.source: When used without parameters, this property returns a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range> object that contains all the columns in the named range.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用不带参数，此属性返回<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range>对象，其中包含指定范围中的所有列。

trans-unit.source: This property can be used with the following optional parameters to get specific columns in the named range.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可以使用以下可选参数，用于指定范围中获取特定的列。

trans-unit.source: If you use this property with parameters, the return value is an object that must be cast to a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range>.
trans-unit.target: 如果参数中使用此属性，返回值是必须强制转换为对象<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range>。

trans-unit.source: Parameter
trans-unit.target: 参数

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The index of one or more columns to get.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取的一个或多个列的索引。

trans-unit.source: To get a single column, pass one of the following objects to this parameter:
trans-unit.target: 若要获取的单个列，请将以下对象之一传递给此参数：

trans-unit.source: - An integer that specifies the index of the column you want to get.
trans-unit.target: 的一个整数，指定你想要获取的列的索引。

trans-unit.source: The column indexes begin at 1.
trans-unit.target: 列索引从 1 开始。

trans-unit.source: - A string that consists of the letter of the column you want to get.
trans-unit.target: 的你想要获取的列的字母组成字符串。

trans-unit.source: To get multiple contiguous columns, pass a string with the format "`first column letter`:`last column letter`".
trans-unit.target: 若要获取多个连续列，请传递与格式字符串"`first column letter`:`last column letter`"。

trans-unit.source: For example, to get columns A through E, pass "A:E".
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要获取列 A 到 E，传递"A:E"。

trans-unit.source: **Note:** The name of this parameter is misleading; this parameter specifies the indexes of the columns you want to get, not the rows.
trans-unit.target: **注意：**此参数的名称有误导性; 此参数指定你想要获取，不是行的列的索引。

trans-unit.source: Do not use this parameter.
trans-unit.target: 不使用此参数。

trans-unit.source: This property will throw a <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException> if you try to pass a value to this parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此属性将引发<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException>如果你尝试将值传递给此参数。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> and then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Columns%2A> property to set the color, name, size, and boldness of the font of all the cells in the first column of the range.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>，然后使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Columns%2A>属性在范围的第一列中设置颜色、 名称、 大小和加粗的字体的所有单元格。

trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码，请将其复制到你的项目中的工作表类之一。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> and then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Columns%2A> property to determine how many columns there are in the range.

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: To run this code, copy it into one of the worksheet classes in your project.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码，请将其复制到你的项目中的工作表类之一。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width of all columns in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件中所有列的宽度。

trans-unit.source: If all columns in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control have the same width, this property returns an object that represents the width.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件中所有的列具有相同的宽度，则此属性返回一个表示该宽度的对象。

trans-unit.source: If columns in the range have different widths, this property returns <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果该范围中的列具有不同宽度，则此属性返回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: One unit of column width is equal to the width of one character in the Normal style.
trans-unit.target: 一个单元的列宽度等于正文样式中的一个字符的宽度。

trans-unit.source: For proportional fonts, the width of the character 0 (zero) is used.
trans-unit.target: 对于非等宽字体使用的字符 0 （零） 的宽度。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range.Width%2A> property to return the width of a column in points.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range.Width%2A>属性以磅为单位返回列的宽度。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> and then sets the width of the columns and the height of the rows that are part of the range.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>，然后设置列的宽度和范围的一部分的行的高度。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Comment" /> that represents the comment associated with the cell in the upper left corner of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Comment" />，它表示与 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件左上角中的单元格相关联的注释。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Comment" /> that represents the comment associated with the cell in the upper left corner of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Comment" />，表示与 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件左上角中的单元格相关联的注释。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> and adds a comment to the cell.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>并将注释添加到单元格。

trans-unit.source: It then displays a message box that causes the comment to become visible if the user clicks **OK**.
trans-unit.target: 然后显示一个消息框，导致变得可见，如果用户单击此注释**确定**。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: The sources of the consolidation as an array of text reference strings in R1C1-style notation.
trans-unit.target: 合并源（作为以 R1C1 样式表示法表示的文本引用字符串的数组）。

trans-unit.source: The references must include the full path of sheets to be consolidated.
trans-unit.target: 引用必须包含要合并的工作表的完整路径。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the following <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlConsolidationFunction" /> constants:
trans-unit.target: 可以是下列 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlConsolidationFunction" /> 常量之一：

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to consolidate data based on column titles in the top row of the consolidation ranges; <see langword="false" /> to consolidate data by position.
trans-unit.target: 如果基于合并范围内首行中的列标题合并数据，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果按位置合并数据，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to consolidate data based on row titles in the left column of the consolidation ranges; <see langword="false" /> to consolidate data by position.
trans-unit.target: 如果基于合并范围内左列中的行标题合并数据，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果按位置合并数据，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to have the consolidation use worksheet links; <see langword="false" /> to have the consolidation copy the data.
trans-unit.target: 如果让合并功能使用工作表链接，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果让合并功能复制数据，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Consolidates data from multiple ranges on multiple worksheets into the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 将多个工作表中多个范围中的数据合并到 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件中。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the range of cells from B1 through D10 to random numbers and then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Consolidate%2A> method to consolidate this range into a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例为随机数字 B1 至 D10 之间设置的单元格范围，然后使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Consolidate%2A>方法以合并到此范围<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>控件。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the new range to which the contents of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control will be copied.
trans-unit.target: 指定要将 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件的内容复制到其中的新范围。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, Microsoft Office Excel copies the range to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则 Microsoft Office Excel 将该范围复制到剪贴板。

trans-unit.source: Copies the contents of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control to the specified range or to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件的内容复制到指定的范围或剪贴板。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Copy%2A> method to copy the contents of a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> control named `NamedRange1` to the Clipboard, and then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.PasteSpecial%2A> method to paste these contents into a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> control named `NamedRange2`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Copy%2A>方法的内容复制<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>控件名为`NamedRange1`到剪贴板，然后使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.PasteSpecial%2A>方法以粘贴到这些内容<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>控件名为`NamedRange2`.

trans-unit.source: The `Operation` parameter is set to <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlPasteSpecialOperation.xlPasteSpecialOperationAdd> so that the content of each cell in `NamedRange1` is added to the corresponding cell in `NamedRange2`.
trans-unit.target: `Operation`参数设置为<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlPasteSpecialOperation.xlPasteSpecialOperationAdd>，以便在每个单元格的内容`NamedRange1`添加到中的相应单元格`NamedRange2`。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: The recordset to copy into the range.
trans-unit.target: 要复制到范围中的记录集。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of records to copy into the worksheet.
trans-unit.target: 要复制到工作表中的记录的最大数目。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, all the records in the recordset object are copied.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则复制记录集对象中的所有记录。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of fields to copy into the worksheet.
trans-unit.target: 要复制到工作表中的字段的最大数目。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, all the fields in the recordset object are copied.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则复制记录集对象中的所有字段。

trans-unit.source: Copies the contents of an ADO or DAO recordset into a worksheet, beginning at the upper-left corner of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 从 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件的左上角开始，将 ADO 或 DAO 记录集的内容复制到工作表中。

trans-unit.source: If the recordset contains fields with OLE objects in them, this method fails.
trans-unit.target: 如果记录集包含与在其中的 OLE 对象的字段，此方法将失败。

trans-unit.source: Copying begins at the current row of the recordset.
trans-unit.target: 复制开始记录集的当前行。

trans-unit.source: After copying is completed, the EOF property of the recordset object is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 复制完成后，记录集对象的 EOF 属性是`true`。

trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: Specifies how the picture should be copied.
trans-unit.target: 指定复制图片的方法。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the following <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlPictureAppearance" /> constants:
trans-unit.target: 可以是下列 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlPictureAppearance" /> 常量之一：

trans-unit.source: The format of the picture.
trans-unit.target: 该图片的格式。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the following <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlCopyPictureFormat" /> constants:
trans-unit.target: 可以是下列 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlCopyPictureFormat" /> 常量之一：

trans-unit.source: Copies the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control to the Clipboard as a picture.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件作为图片复制到剪贴板。

trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> and populates it with the word Smith.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>word Smith 并用其填充它。

trans-unit.source: It then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.CopyPicture%2A> method to copy the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> to the Clipboard as a bitmap.
trans-unit.target: 然后，它使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.CopyPicture%2A>方法以复制<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>到剪贴板以位图格式。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of cells in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件中单元格的数目。

trans-unit.source: The number of cells in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件中单元格的数目。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> and colors the interior green.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>和颜色内部绿色。

trans-unit.source: It then displays a series of messages that show how many cells, columns, and rows are in the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>.
trans-unit.target: 然后，它显示的消息的显示多少单元格，列系列和行<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of occurrences of the largest value in a range of values.
trans-unit.target: 获取值范围内最大值出现的次数。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the number of occurrences of the largest value in a range of values.
trans-unit.target: 表示在值范围内最大值出现的次数的对象。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to create names by using labels in the top row.
trans-unit.target: 如果通过使用首行中的标签来创建名称，则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to create names by using labels in the left column.
trans-unit.target: 如果通过使用左列中的标签来创建名称，则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to create names by using labels in the bottom row.
trans-unit.target: 如果通过使用底端行中的标签来创建名称，则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to create names by using labels in the right column.
trans-unit.target: 如果通过使用右列中的标签来创建名称，则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates names in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control, based on text labels in the sheet.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件中基于表中的文本标签创建名称。

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify one of `Top`, `Left`, `Bottom`, or `Right`, Microsoft Office Excel guesses the location of the text labels, based on the shape of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> control.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不指定其中一个`Top`， `Left`， `Bottom`，或`Right`，Microsoft Office Excel 猜出文本标签，基于的形状上的位置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>控件。

trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a 32-bit integer that indicates the application in which the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control was created.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 32 位整数，该整数指示已在其中创建 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlCreator" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlCreator" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> control was created in Microsoft Office Excel, this property returns the hexadecimal number 5843454C, which is equivalent to string XCEL.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>在 Microsoft Office Excel 中创建控件，则此属性返回十六进制数字 5843454 C 中，该数字与字符串接等效。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> and then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Creator%2A> property to determine whether the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> was created in Microsoft Office Excel.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>，然后使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Creator%2A>属性来确定是否<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>在 Microsoft Office Excel 中创建。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: If the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control is part of an array, gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> that represents the entire array.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件属于某个数组，则获取一个表示整个数组的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> that represents an array, if the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control is part of an array.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> 控件属于某个数组，则为表示数组的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> that represents the current region.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个表示当前区域的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> that represents the current region.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示当前区域的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" />。

trans-unit.source: The current region is a range bounded by any combination of blank rows and blank columns.
trans-unit.target: 当前的区域是受空白的行和空白的列的任意组合的范围。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be used on a protected worksheet.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不能在受保护工作表。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> and populates it with the value 123.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>值 123 并用其填充它。

trans-unit.source: It then colors the current region, which is the region bounded by blank rows and columns, green.
trans-unit.target: 然后进行着色的当前区域，这是由空白的行和列，绿色包围的区域。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.

trans-unit.source: The range where the data should be pasted.
trans-unit.target: 应当将数据粘贴到其中的范围。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, the object is cut to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则将对象剪切到剪贴板。

trans-unit.source: Cuts the contents of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control to the Clipboard or pastes it into a specified destination.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件的内容剪切到剪贴板，或者将它复制到指定的目标。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Find%2A> method to find the first cell with the value `Seashell` in a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Find%2A>方法以查找具有值的第一个单元格`Seashell`中<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>控件。

trans-unit.source: The example then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.FindNext%2A> and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.FindPrevious%2A> methods to find the next cell with the value `Seashell` and then return to the original cell.
trans-unit.target: 然后该示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.FindNext%2A>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.FindPrevious%2A>方法查找具有值的下一步单元格`Seashell`，然后返回到原始的单元格。

trans-unit.source: Finally, the example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Cut%2A> method to cut the contents of the first cell with the value `Seashell` and paste it into cell B1.
trans-unit.target: 最后，该示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Cut%2A>方法剪切具有值的第一个单元格的内容`Seashell`并将它粘贴到单元格 B1。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Can be the <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlRowCol.xlRows" /> or <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlRowCol.xlColumns" /> constant to have the data series entered in rows or columns, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 可以为 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlRowCol.xlRows" /> 或 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlRowCol.xlColumns" /> 常数以将数据系列分别输入行或列中。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, the size and shape of the range is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则使用该范围的大小和形状。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the following <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlDataSeriesType" /> constants:
trans-unit.target: 可以是下列 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlDataSeriesType" /> 常量之一：

trans-unit.source: If the <c>Type</c> argument is <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlDataSeriesType.xlChronological" />, the <c>Date</c> argument indicates the step date unit.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>Type</c> 参数为 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlDataSeriesType.xlChronological" />，则 <c>Date</c> 参数指示步长日期单位。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the following <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlDataSeriesDate" /> constants:
trans-unit.target: 可以是下列 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlDataSeriesDate" /> 常量之一：

trans-unit.source: The step value for the series.
trans-unit.target: 该系列的步长值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 1 (one).
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 1（一）。

trans-unit.source: The stop value for the series.
trans-unit.target: 该系列的终止值。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, Microsoft Office Excel fills to the end of the range.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则 Microsoft Office Excel 会填充到该范围的末尾。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to create a linear trend or growth trend; <see langword="false" /> to create a standard data series.
trans-unit.target: 如果创建等差序列或等比序列，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果创建标准数据系列，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a data series in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件中创建一个数据系列。

trans-unit.source: Deletes a dynamically created <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control and removes it from the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ControlCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 删除动态创建的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件并将其从 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ControlCollection" /> 中移除。

trans-unit.source: This method should only be used with a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> control that is created programmatically at run time.
trans-unit.target: 此方法仅应该用于<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>在运行时以编程方式创建的控件。

trans-unit.source: An exception is thrown if you call this method on a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> control that is added to the document at design time.
trans-unit.target: 如果在调用此方法引发异常<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>在设计时添加到文档的控制。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> control that includes cells A1 through A5 to random values, and then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Delete%2A> method to remove the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>包括 A1 到单元格 A5 到随机值，然后使用的控件<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Delete%2A>方法移除<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>控件。

trans-unit.source: Note that although the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> control is deleted, cells A1 through A5 retain their values.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，虽然<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>删除控件，通过 A5 A1 单元格保留其值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> and sets a reference in cell A1 to refer to the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>.

trans-unit.target: 它然后 A2 来引用单元格 A1 单元格中设置的引用。

trans-unit.source: The code example then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Dependents%2A> property to select the dependents of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>, which are cells A1 and A2.
trans-unit.target: 然后，该代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Dependents%2A>属性选择的依赖项<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>，这是单元格 A1 和 A2。

trans-unit.source: Designates the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control to be recalculated when the next recalculation occurs.
trans-unit.target: 指定要在下一次重新计算时重新计算的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Calculate%2A> method forces the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> control to be recalculated, for cells that Microsoft Office Excel understands as needing recalculation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Calculate%2A>方法强制<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>控件进行重复计算，Microsoft Office Excel 理解为需要重新计算的单元格。

trans-unit.source: If the application is in manual calculation mode, using the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Dirty%2A> method instructs Excel to identify the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> control to be recalculated.
trans-unit.target: 如果应用程序用于手动计算模式中，使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Dirty%2A>方法指示 Excel 标识<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>控件重新计算。

trans-unit.source: If the application is in automatic calculation mode, using the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Dirty%2A> method instructs Excel to perform a recalculation.
trans-unit.target: 如果应用程序是在自动计算模式下，使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Dirty%2A>方法指示 Excel 执行重新计算。

trans-unit.source: Discards all changes in the edited cells of the range.
trans-unit.target: 放弃范围内已编辑单元格中的所有更改。

trans-unit.source: For a range based on an OLAP data source, this method removes all values and formulas entered in the cells, and then runs an update operation to retrieve the latest values from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 对于基于 OLAP 数据源的范围，此方法中删除所有值和公式的单元中输入，然后运行更新操作来从数据源检索的最新值。

trans-unit.source: It sets the data source value to NULL for all value cells that are edited, and also executes a ROLLBACK TRANSACTION statement against the OLAP server.
trans-unit.target: 它将所有值单元格的编辑，并还执行 ROLLBACK TRANSACTION 语句针对的 OLAP 服务器的数据源值都设置为 NULL。

trans-unit.source: For ranges based on non-OLAP data sources, this method simply clears all edited cells.
trans-unit.target: 对于基于非 OLAP 数据源的范围，此方法只是清除所有编辑过的单元格。

trans-unit.source: However, this method cannot be used in Excel 2007 projects.

trans-unit.source: Parameter
trans-unit.target: 参数

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlDirection> values that indicates the direction in which to find the last cell.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlDirection>值，该值指示在其中查找最后一个单元格的方向。

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to use <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.End%2A> without specifying any parameters, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.End%2A> will get a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange_EndType> object that is part of the Visual Studio infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 如果你尝试使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.End%2A>而不指定任何参数，<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.End%2A>将获取<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange_EndType>对象，是 Visual Studio 基础结构的一部分和不应在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: This property is equivalent to pressing END+UP ARROW, END+DOWN ARROW, END+LEFT ARROW, or END+RIGHT ARROW.
trans-unit.target: 此属性等效于按结束 + 向上键、 结束 + 向下箭头、 结束 + 向左键或结束 + 向右键。
