trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" />，表示包含 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件的整行（或多行）。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> and then sets the border color of the columns and rows that contain the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> to green.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>，然后将设置的列和包含的行的边框颜色<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>为绿色。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Errors" /> object that enables you to access error checking options.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个使您可以访问错误检查选项的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Errors" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Errors" /> object that enables you to access error checking options.
trans-unit.target: 一个使您可以访问错误检查选项的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Errors" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Reference the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Errors> object to view a list of index values associated with error checking options.
trans-unit.target: 引用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Errors>错误检查选项与关联的对象以查看索引值的列表。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> and inserts a number written as text into the range, and then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Errors%2A> property to determine whether the number is written as text.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>和插入到的区域中，为文本格式的数字，然后使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Errors%2A>属性来确定是否以文本形式写入数。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: The type of file format to export to.
trans-unit.target: 要导出到的文件的格式类型。

trans-unit.source: The file name of the file to be saved.
trans-unit.target: 要保存的文件的文件名。

trans-unit.source: You can include a full path, or Excel saves the file in the current folder.
trans-unit.target: 可包括完整路径，或者 Excel 会将文件保存到当前文件夹中。

trans-unit.source: Optional <see langword="XlFixedFormatQuality" />.
trans-unit.target: 可选的 <see langword="XlFixedFormatQuality" />。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the quality of the published file.
trans-unit.target: 指定所发布文件的质量。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to include the document properties; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要包括文档属性，请使用 <see langword="true" />；否则使用 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to ignore any print areas set when exporting; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要在导出时忽略任何打印区域设置，请使用 <see langword="true" />；否则使用 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The number of the first page to start exporting.
trans-unit.target: 要导出的起始页的页码。

trans-unit.source: By default, exporting starts at the beginning.
trans-unit.target: 默认从第一页开始导出。

trans-unit.source: The number of the last page to export.
trans-unit.target: 要导出的最后一页的页码。

trans-unit.source: By default, exporting ends at the last page.
trans-unit.target: 默认在导出最后一页后停止导出。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to display the file in the viewer immediately; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果立即在查看器中显示文件，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A pointer to an implementation of the <see langword="IMsoDocExporter" /> interface that enables the workbook to be saved in a different fixed format.
trans-unit.target: 一个指向 <see langword="IMsoDocExporter" /> 接口的实现的指针，可使工作簿保存为另一种固定格式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see Extending the Office (2007) Fixed-Format Export Feature.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅“扩展 Office (2007) 固定格式导出功能”。

trans-unit.source: Exports to a file of the specified format.
trans-unit.target: 导出到指定格式的文件。

trans-unit.source: This method also supports initializing an add-in to export a file to a fixed-format file.
trans-unit.target: 此方法还支持初始化外接程序将文件导出到固定格式文件。

trans-unit.source: For example, Excel will perform file format conversion if the converters are present.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果存在转换器，则 Excel 将执行文件的格式转换。

trans-unit.source: The conversion is usually initiated by the user.
trans-unit.target: 通常由用户启动转换。

trans-unit.source: The following code example saves one page that contains the named range `NamedRange1` in PDF format to the specified file path and file name using the standard quality resolution.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将保存一个页面，其中包含命名的范围`NamedRange1`以 PDF 格式保存到指定的文件路径和文件的名称，使用标准质量分辨率。

trans-unit.source: The generated PDF file includes the workbook properties.
trans-unit.target: 生成的 PDF 文件包括工作簿属性。

trans-unit.source: To run this code example, your workbook must include a sheet named `Sheet1` with a named range named `NamedRange1` that contains some data.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，你的工作簿必须包含名为的表`Sheet1`与名为的命名区域`NamedRange1`包含一些数据。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Fills down from the top cell or cells in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control to the bottom of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 从 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件中的顶端单元格向下填充到 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件的底端。

trans-unit.source: The contents and formatting of the cell or cells in the top row of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> control are copied into the rest of the rows in the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> control.
trans-unit.target: 内容和格式的或多个单元中的顶行<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>控件复制到中的行的其余部分<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>控件。

trans-unit.source: Fills left from the rightmost cell or cells in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 从 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件最右侧的单元格向左填充。

trans-unit.source: The contents and formatting of the cell or cells in the rightmost column of the range are copied into the rest of the columns in the range.
trans-unit.target: 内容和格式的单元格或范围的最右列中的单元格复制到区域中的列的其余部分。

trans-unit.source: Fills right from the leftmost cell or cells in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 从 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件中最左侧的单元格向右填充。

trans-unit.source: The contents and formatting of the cell or cells in the leftmost column of the range are copied into the rest of the columns in the range.
trans-unit.target: 内容和格式的单元格或范围的最左侧列中的单元格复制到区域中的列的其余部分。

trans-unit.source: Fills up from the bottom cell or cells in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control to the top of the range.
trans-unit.target: 从 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件中的底端单元格向上填充到该范围的顶端。

trans-unit.source: The contents and formatting of the cell or cells in the bottom row of the range are copied into the rest of the rows in the range.
trans-unit.target: 内容和格式的单元格或范围的底部行中的单元格复制到范围中的行的其余部分。

trans-unit.source: The data to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的数据。

trans-unit.source: Can be a string or any Microsoft Office Excel data type.
trans-unit.target: 可以是字符串或任何 Microsoft Office Excel 数据类型。

trans-unit.source: The cell after which you want the search to begin.
trans-unit.target: 从其后开始搜索的单元格。

trans-unit.source: This corresponds to the position of the active cell when a search is done from the user interface.
trans-unit.target: 此单元格就是从用户界面执行的搜索完成后处于活动状态的单元格。

trans-unit.source: Note that <c>After</c> must be a single cell in the range.
trans-unit.target: 注意，<c>After</c> 必须是该范围中的单个单元格。

trans-unit.source: Remember that the search begins after this cell; the specified cell is not searched until the method wraps back around to this cell.
trans-unit.target: 请记住，搜索将从该单元格之后开始；只有方法绕回到指定的单元格之后，才会搜索该单元格。

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify this argument, the search starts after the cell in the upper-left corner of the range.
trans-unit.target: 如果您未指定此参数，则从该范围左上角中的单元格之后开始搜索。

trans-unit.source: The type of information.
trans-unit.target: 信息的类型。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the following <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlLookAt" /> values: <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlLookAt.xlWhole" /> or <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlLookAt.xlPart" />.
trans-unit.target: 可以是下列 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlLookAt" /> 值之一：<see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlLookAt.xlWhole" /> 或 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlLookAt.xlPart" />。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the following <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlSearchOrder" /> values: <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlSearchOrder.xlByRows" /> or <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlSearchOrder.xlByColumns" />.
trans-unit.target: 可以是下列 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlSearchOrder" /> 值之一：<see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlSearchOrder.xlByRows" /> 或 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlSearchOrder.xlByColumns" />。

trans-unit.source: The search direction.
trans-unit.target: 搜索方向。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the following <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlSearchDirection" /> values:
trans-unit.target: 可以是下列 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlSearchDirection" /> 值之一：

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlSearchDirection.xlNext" /> or <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlSearchDirection.xlPrevious" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlSearchDirection.xlNext" /> 或 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlSearchDirection.xlPrevious" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to make the search case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 如果在搜索时区分大小写，则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Used only if you have selected or installed double-byte language support.
trans-unit.target: 仅当已选择或安装双字节语言支持时，才会用到此参数。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to have double-byte characters match only double-byte characters; <see langword="false" /> to have double-byte characters match their single-byte equivalents.
trans-unit.target: 如果让双字节字符仅与双字节字符相匹配，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果让双字节字符与其单字节等效字符相匹配，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The search format.
trans-unit.target: 搜索格式。

trans-unit.source: Finds specific information in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control, and returns a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> object that represents the first cell where that information is found.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件中查找特定的信息，然后返回一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> 对象，该对象表示在其中找到此信息的第一个单元格。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> object that represents the first cell where the information is found.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> 对象，表示在其中找到该信息的第一个单元格。

trans-unit.source: This method returns `null` if no match is found.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回`null`如果未找到匹配。

trans-unit.source: This method does not affect the selection or the active cell.
trans-unit.target: 选定内容或活动的单元格，则此方法不会影响。

trans-unit.source: The settings for `LookIn`, `LookAt`, `SearchOrder`, and `MatchByte` are saved each time you use this method.
trans-unit.target: 有关设置`LookIn`， `LookAt`， `SearchOrder`，和`MatchByte`保存每次使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify values for these arguments the next time you call the method, the saved values are used.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不指定这些参数的值在调用该方法的下一步时，将使用保存的值。

trans-unit.source: Setting these arguments changes the settings in the Find dialog box, and changing the settings in the Find dialog box changes the saved values that are used if you omit the arguments.
trans-unit.target: 设置这些参数将更改查找对话框中中的设置并更改查找对话框中的设置更改保存如果省略这些参数，则使用的值。

trans-unit.source: To avoid problems, set these arguments explicitly each time you use this method.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免出现问题，这些自变量显式设置每次使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.FindNext%2A> and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.FindPrevious%2A> methods to repeat the search.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.FindNext%2A>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.FindPrevious%2A>方法重复搜索。

trans-unit.source: When the search reaches the end of the specified search range, it wraps around to the beginning of the range.
trans-unit.target: 如果搜索到达搜索指定的搜索范围的末尾，它会绕到范围的开始处。

trans-unit.source: To stop a search when this wraparound occurs, save the address of the first found cell, and then test each successive found-cell address against this saved address.
trans-unit.target: 若要停止搜索此头尾回绕发生时，保存的第一个找到的单元格的地址并随后测试此保存地址针对每个连续找到单元格地址。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Find%2A> method to find the first cell with the value `Seashell` in a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Find%2A>方法以查找具有值的第一个单元格`Seashell`中<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>控件。

trans-unit.source: The example then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.FindNext%2A> and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.FindPrevious%2A> methods to find the next cell with the value `Seashell` and then return to the original cell.
trans-unit.target: 然后该示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.FindNext%2A>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.FindPrevious%2A>方法查找具有值的下一步单元格`Seashell`，然后返回到原始的单元格。

trans-unit.source: Finally, the example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Cut%2A> method to cut the contents of the first cell with the value `Seashell` and paste it into cell B1.
trans-unit.target: 最后，该示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Cut%2A>方法剪切具有值的第一个单元格的内容`Seashell`并将它粘贴到单元格 B1。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: The cell after which you want to search.
trans-unit.target: 要在其之后搜索的单元格。

trans-unit.source: This corresponds to the position of the active cell when a search is done from the user interface.
trans-unit.target: 此单元格就是从用户界面执行的搜索完成后处于活动状态的单元格。

trans-unit.source: Note that <c>After</c> must be a single cell in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 注意，<c>After</c> 必须是 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件中的单个单元格。

trans-unit.source: Remember that the search begins after this cell; the specified cell is not searched until the method wraps back around to this cell.
trans-unit.target: 请记住，搜索将从该单元格之后开始；只有方法绕回到指定的单元格之后，才会搜索该单元格。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is not specified, the search starts after the cell in the upper-left corner of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定此参数，则从 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件左上角中的单元格之后开始搜索。

trans-unit.source: Continues a search that was begun with the <see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Find(System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlSearchDirection,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 继续执行用 <see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Find(System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlSearchDirection,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object)" /> 方法开始的搜索。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> object that represents a cell containing the specified information.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> 对象，表示包含指定信息的单元格。

trans-unit.source: Finds the next cell that matches the same conditions as the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Find%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 查找为相同的条件相匹配的下一步单元格<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Find%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This method does not affect the selection or the active cell.
trans-unit.target: 选定内容或活动的单元格，则此方法不会影响。

trans-unit.source: When the search reaches the end of the specified search range, it wraps around to the beginning of the range.
trans-unit.target: 如果搜索到达搜索指定的搜索范围的末尾，它会绕到范围的开始处。

trans-unit.source: To stop a search when this wraparound occurs, save the address of the first found cell, and then test each successive found-cell address against this saved address.
trans-unit.target: 若要停止搜索此头尾回绕发生时，保存的第一个找到的单元格的地址并随后测试此保存地址针对每个连续找到单元格地址。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Find%2A> method to find the first cell with the value `Seashell` in a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Find%2A>方法以查找具有值的第一个单元格`Seashell`中<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>控件。

trans-unit.source: The example then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.FindNext%2A> and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.FindPrevious%2A> methods to find the next cell with the value `Seashell` and then return to the original cell.
trans-unit.target: 然后该示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.FindNext%2A>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.FindPrevious%2A>方法查找具有值的下一步单元格`Seashell`，然后返回到原始的单元格。

trans-unit.source: Finally, the example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Cut%2A> method to cut the contents of the first cell with the value `Seashell` and paste it into cell B1.
trans-unit.target: 最后，该示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Cut%2A>方法剪切具有值的第一个单元格的内容`Seashell`并将它粘贴到单元格 B1。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: The cell before which you want to search.
trans-unit.target: 要在其之前搜索的单元格。

trans-unit.source: This corresponds to the position of the active cell when a search is done from the user interface.
trans-unit.target: 此单元格就是从用户界面执行的搜索完成后处于活动状态的单元格。

trans-unit.source: Note that <c>After</c> must be a single cell in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 注意，<c>After</c> 必须是 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件中的单个单元格。

trans-unit.source: Remember that the search begins before this cell; the specified cell is not searched until the method wraps back around to this cell.
trans-unit.target: 请记住，搜索将从该单元格之后开始；只有方法绕回到指定的单元格之后，才会搜索该单元格。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is not specified, the search starts before the upper-left cell in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定此参数，则从 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件左上角单元格之前开始搜索。

trans-unit.source: Continues a search that was begun with the <see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Find(System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlSearchDirection,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 继续执行用 <see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Find(System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlSearchDirection,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object)" /> 方法开始的搜索。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> object that represents a cell containing the specified information.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> 对象，表示包含指定信息的单元格。

trans-unit.source: Finds the previous cell that matches the same conditions as the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Find%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 查找上一个单元格，为同一个条件相匹配<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Find%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This method does not affect the selection or the active cell.
trans-unit.target: 选定内容或活动的单元格，则此方法不会影响。

trans-unit.source: When the search reaches the beginning of the specified search range, it wraps around to the end of the range.
trans-unit.target: 如果搜索到达搜索指定的搜索范围的开始处，它会绕到范围的末尾。

trans-unit.source: To stop a search when this wraparound occurs, save the address of the first found cell, and then test each successive found-cell address against this saved address.
trans-unit.target: 若要停止搜索此头尾回绕发生时，保存的第一个找到的单元格的地址并随后测试此保存地址针对每个连续找到单元格地址。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Find%2A> method to find the first cell with the value `Seashell` in a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Find%2A>方法以查找具有值的第一个单元格`Seashell`中<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>控件。

trans-unit.source: The example then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.FindNext%2A> and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.FindPrevious%2A> methods to find the next cell with the value `Seashell` and then return to the original cell.
trans-unit.target: 然后该示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.FindNext%2A>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.FindPrevious%2A>方法查找具有值的下一步单元格`Seashell`，然后返回到原始的单元格。

trans-unit.source: Finally, the example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Cut%2A> method to cut the contents of the first cell with the value `Seashell` and paste it into cell B1.
trans-unit.target: 最后，该示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Cut%2A>方法剪切具有值的第一个单元格的内容`Seashell`并将它粘贴到单元格 B1。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Font" /> that represents the font of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Font" /> 控件的字体的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Font" /> that represents the font of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Font" /> 控件的字体的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to set a variety of formatting and display characteristics of a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> control named `NamedRange1`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何设置各种不同的格式并显示特征<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>控件名为`NamedRange1`。

trans-unit.source: In particular, this example sets the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Font%2A> property to "Verdana".
trans-unit.target: 具体而言，此示例设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Font%2A>属性设置为"宋体"。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.FormatConditions" /> collection that represents all the conditional formats for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.FormatConditions" /> 集合，该集合表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件的所有条件格式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.FormatConditions" /> collection that represents all the conditional formats for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.FormatConditions" /> 集合，表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件的所有条件格式。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> and then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.FormatConditions%2A> property to alter the font in the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> if the value in the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> is less than the value of cell A1.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>，然后使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.FormatConditions%2A>属性更改中的字体<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>如果中的值<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>小于 A1 单元格的值。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control's formula in A1-style notation.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件的用 A1 样式表示法表示的公式。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control's formula in A1-style notation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件的用 A1 样式表示法表示的公式。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> control contains a constant, this property returns the constant.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>控件包含一个常数，则此属性返回的常量。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> control is empty, this property returns an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>控件为空，则此属性返回一个空字符串。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> control contains a formula, this property returns the formula as a string in the same format that would be displayed in the formula bar (including the equal sign).
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>控件包含一个公式，则此属性将显示在公式栏 （包括等号） 的格式相同以字符串形式返回该公式。

trans-unit.source: If you set the value or formula of a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> control to a date, Microsoft Office Excel checks to see whether that cell is already formatted with one of the date or time number formats.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置的值或公式<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>控制为日期，Microsoft Office Excel 将检查以查看是否使用日期或时间的数字格式之一已格式化该单元格。

trans-unit.source: If not, Excel changes the number format to the default short date number format.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有，Excel 更改为默认的短日期数字格式的数字格式。

trans-unit.source: If the range is a one-dimensional or two-dimensional range, you can set the formula to an array of the same dimensions.
trans-unit.target: 如果该范围是一维或二维范围，你可以设置为具有相同维数的数组的公式。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, you can put the formula into an array.
trans-unit.target: 同样，你可以将该公式放入数组中。

trans-unit.source: Setting the formula for a multiple-cell <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> control fills all cells in the control with the formula.
trans-unit.target: 设置多个单元格的公式<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>控件将填充使用公式控件中的所有单元格。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Formula%2A> property of a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> control to calculate the sum of cells A1 through A5, uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.FormulaHidden%2A> property to hide the formula, and then calls the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Calculate%2A> method to calculate the sum of the cells and place the sum in cell A6.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Formula%2A>属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>控件来对其求和的单元格 A1 到 A5，使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.FormulaHidden%2A>属性来隐藏公式，并随后将调用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Calculate%2A>方法来对其求和的单元格和将其放在单元格中 A6。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the array formula of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件的数组公式。

trans-unit.source: The array formula of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件的数组公式。

trans-unit.source: This property returns (or can be set to) a single formula or an array.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回 （或可以将设置为） 的单个公式或数组。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> control does not contain an array formula, this property returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>控件不包含公式的数组，此属性返回`null`。

trans-unit.source: If you use this property to enter an array formula, the formula must use the R1C1 reference style, not the A1 reference style.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性用于输入数组公式，该公式必须使用 R1C1 引用样式，不将 A1 引用样式。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> and then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.FormulaArray%2A> property to set the value of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> to equal the sum of the array of cells A1 through A3.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>，然后使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.FormulaArray%2A>属性设置的值<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>为相等的单元格 A1 A3 到数组的总和。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the formula in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control will be hidden when the worksheet is protected.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在工作表受到保护时，是否隐藏 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件中的公式。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the formula will be hidden when the worksheet is protected; <see langword="null" /> if the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control contains some cells with <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.FormulaHidden" /> equal to <see langword="true" /> and some cells with <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.FormulaHidden" /> equal to <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在工作表受到保护时将隐藏公式，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件包含一些 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.FormulaHidden" /> 等于 <see langword="null" /> 的单元格和一些 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.FormulaHidden" /> 等于 <see langword="true" /> 的单元格，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Do not confuse this property with the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range.Hidden%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 将此属性与不混淆<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range.Hidden%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The formula will not be hidden if the workbook is protected and the worksheet is not.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作簿受到保护并且不是工作表，则不会隐藏公式。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Formula%2A> property of a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> control to calculate the sum of cells A1 through A5, uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.FormulaHidden%2A> property to hide the formula, and then calls the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Calculate%2A> method to calculate the sum of the cells and place the sum in cell A6.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Formula%2A>属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>控件来对其求和的单元格 A1 到 A5，使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.FormulaHidden%2A>属性来隐藏公式，并随后将调用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Calculate%2A>方法来对其求和的单元格和将其放在单元格中 A6。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the formula for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control, using A1-style references in the language of the user.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件的公式，该公式使用用户语言的 A1 样式的引用。

trans-unit.source: The formula for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control, using A1-style references in the language of the user.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件的公式，使用用户语言的 A1 样式的引用。

trans-unit.source: Using this property on a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> control that contains multiple cells will cause an exception to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性上<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>包含多个单元格的控件将导致异常引发。

trans-unit.source: If the cell contains a constant, this property returns that constant.
trans-unit.target: 如果该单元格包含常量，此属性返回的就是，常量。

trans-unit.source: If the cell is empty, this property returns an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 如果该单元格为空，则此属性返回一个空字符串。

trans-unit.source: If the cell contains a formula, this property returns the formula as a string, in the same format in which it would be displayed in the formula bar (including the equal sign).
trans-unit.target: 如果该单元格包含一个公式，此属性将返回为字符串，其中它将显示在公式栏 （包括等号） 的格式相同的公式。

trans-unit.source: If you set the value or formula of a cell to a date, Microsoft Office Excel checks to see whether that cell is already formatted with one of the date or time number formats.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置为日期单元格公式的值，Microsoft Office Excel 会检查以确定是否使用日期或时间的数字格式之一已格式化该单元格。

trans-unit.source: If not, the number format is changed to the default short date number format.
trans-unit.target: 否则，数字格式更改为默认的短日期数字格式。

trans-unit.source: If the range is a one-dimensional or two-dimensional range, you can set the formula to an array of the same dimensions.
trans-unit.target: 如果该范围是一维或二维范围，你可以设置为具有相同维数的数组的公式。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, you can put the formula into an array.
trans-unit.target: 同样，你可以将该公式放入数组中。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> and then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.FormulaLocal%2A> property to set the value of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> to equal the sum of the values of cells A1 and A2.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>，然后使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.FormulaLocal%2A>属性设置的值<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>为相等的单元格 A1 和 A2 的值的总和。

trans-unit.source: The formula is localized according to the language of the system it is run on.
trans-unit.target: 该公式根据系统运行的语言进行了本地化。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the formula for the object, using R1C1-style notation.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置该对象的用 R1C1 样式表示法表示的公式。

trans-unit.source: The formula for the object, using R1C1-style notation.
trans-unit.target: 该对象的用 R1C1 样式表示法表示的公式。

trans-unit.source: Using this property on a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> control that contains multiple cells will cause an exception to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性上<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>包含多个单元格的控件将导致异常引发。

trans-unit.source: If the cell contains a constant, this property returns the constant.
trans-unit.target: 如果该单元格包含常量，此属性将返回常量。

trans-unit.source: If the cell is empty, this property returns an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 如果该单元格为空，则此属性返回一个空字符串。

trans-unit.source: If the cell contains a formula, this property returns the formula as a string, in the same format in which it would be displayed in the formula bar (including the equal sign).
trans-unit.target: 如果该单元格包含一个公式，此属性将返回为字符串，其中它将显示在公式栏 （包括等号） 的格式相同的公式。

trans-unit.source: If you set the value or formula of a cell to a date, Microsoft Office Excel checks to see whether that cell is already formatted with one of the date or time number formats.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置为日期单元格公式的值，Microsoft Office Excel 会检查以确定是否使用日期或时间的数字格式之一已格式化该单元格。

trans-unit.source: If not, the number format is changed to the default short date number format.
trans-unit.target: 否则，数字格式更改为默认的短日期数字格式。

trans-unit.source: If the range is a one-dimensional or two-dimensional range, you can set the formula to an array of the same dimensions.
trans-unit.target: 如果该范围是一维或二维范围，你可以设置为具有相同维数的数组的公式。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, you can put the formula into an array.
trans-unit.target: 同样，你可以将该公式放入数组中。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> and then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.FormulaR1C1%2A> property to set the value of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> to equal the square root of cell A1, as specified using R1C1 notation.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>，然后使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.FormulaR1C1%2A>属性设置的值<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>为 A1 单元格，平方根等于作为使用 R1C1 表示法指定。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the formula for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control, using R1C1-style notation in the language of the user.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件的公式，该公式使用用户语言的 R1C1 样式表示法。

trans-unit.source: The formula for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control, using R1C1-style notation in the language of the user.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件的公式，使用用户语言的 R1C1 样式表示法。

trans-unit.source: Using this property on a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> control that contains multiple cells will cause an exception to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性上<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>包含多个单元格的控件将导致异常引发。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> control contains a constant, this property returns that constant.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> control is empty, this property returns an empty string.

trans-unit.source: Similarly, you can put the formula into an array.
trans-unit.target: 同样，你可以将该公式放入数组中。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> and then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.FormulaR1C1%2A> property to set the value of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> to equal the square root of cell A1, as specified using R1C1 notation.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>，然后使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.FormulaR1C1%2A>属性设置的值<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>为 A1 单元格，平方根等于作为使用 R1C1 表示法指定。

trans-unit.source: The formula is localized according to the language of the system it is run on.
trans-unit.target: 该公式根据系统运行的语言进行了本地化。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Starts the **Function Wizard** for the upper-left cell of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 对 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件左上角的单元格启动“函数向导”。

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> that can be used to iterate over the cells in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" />，它可用于循环访问 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件中的单元格。

trans-unit.source: The first value to be grouped.
trans-unit.target: 要进行分组的第一个值。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted or <see langword="true" />, the first value in the field is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数或者它为 <see langword="true" />，则使用该字段中的第一个值。

trans-unit.source: The last value to be grouped.
trans-unit.target: 要进行分组的最后一个值。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted or <see langword="true" />, the last value in the field is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数或者它为 <see langword="true" />，则使用该字段中的最后一个值。

trans-unit.source: If the field is numeric, this argument specifies the size of each group.
trans-unit.target: 如果该字段为数值字段，则此参数指定每组的大小。

trans-unit.source: If the field is a date, this argument specifies the number of days in each group if element 4 in the <c>Periods</c> array is <see langword="true" /> and all the other elements are <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果该字段是日期字段，则此参数指定当 <c>Periods</c> 数组中的元素 4 为 <see langword="true" /> 而所有其他元素为 <see langword="false" /> 时每一组中的天数。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this argument is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 否则，将忽略此参数。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, Microsoft Office Excel automatically chooses a default group size.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则 Microsoft Office Excel 会自动选择一个默认的组大小。

trans-unit.source: An array of seven Boolean values that specify the period for the group, as shown:
trans-unit.target: 一个数组，包含七个为该组指定时间段的布尔值，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: 1 - Seconds
2 - Minutes
trans-unit.target: 2 — 分钟

trans-unit.source: 3 - Hours
4 - Days
trans-unit.target: 4 — 日期

trans-unit.source: 5 - Months
trans-unit.target: 5 — 月份

trans-unit.source: 6 - Quarters
trans-unit.target: 6 — 季度

trans-unit.source: 7 - Years
trans-unit.target: 7 — 年份

trans-unit.source: If an element in the array is <see langword="true" />, a group is created for the corresponding time; if the element is <see langword="false" />, no group is created.
trans-unit.target: 如果数组中的某个元素为 <see langword="true" />，则针对相应的时间创建一个组；如果该元素为 <see langword="false" />，则不创建组。

trans-unit.source: If the field is not a date field, this argument is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果字段不是日期字段，则省略此参数。

trans-unit.source: When the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control represents a single cell in a PivotTable field’s data range, the <see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Group(System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object)" /> method performs numeric or date-based grouping in that field.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件表示数据透视表字段的数据范围中的单个单元格时，<see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Group(System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object)" /> 方法在该字段中执行基于数值或日期的分组。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> control must be a single cell in the PivotTable field’s data range.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>控件必须为数据透视表字段的数据区域中的单个单元格。

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to apply this method to more than one cell, it fails (without displaying an error message).
trans-unit.target: 如果你尝试对多个单元格应用此方法，就会失败 （而不显示一条错误消息）。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a PivotTable report and a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> inside the area of the PivotTable report.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建数据透视表和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>内的数据透视表的区域。

trans-unit.source: It then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.PivotTable%2A>, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.LocationInTable%2A>, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.PivotCell%2A>, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.PivotItem%2A>, and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.PivotField%2A> properties to display information about the placement of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> within the PivotTable report.
trans-unit.target: 然后，它使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.PivotTable%2A>， <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.LocationInTable%2A>， <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.PivotCell%2A>， <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.PivotItem%2A>，和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.PivotField%2A>要显示的布局的信息的属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>数据透视表中。

trans-unit.source: The example also uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Group%2A> method to perform numeric grouping based on the first value in the field.
trans-unit.target: 此示例还使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Group%2A>方法来执行数值分组基于字段中的第一个值。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control is part of an array formula.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件是否属于数组公式。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control is part of an array formula; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件属于数组公式，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether all cells in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control contain formulas.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件中的所有单元格是否包含公式。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if all cells in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control contain formulas; <see langword="false" /> if none of the cells in the range contains a formula; <see langword="null" /> otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件中的所有单元格都包含公式，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果该范围中的任何单元格都不包含公式，则为 <see langword="false" />；除此之外，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the height of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件的高度。

trans-unit.source: The height of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件的高度。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> and then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Width%2A> and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Height%2A> properties to display the width and height of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>，然后使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Width%2A>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Height%2A>要显示的宽度和高度属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an object that indicates whether the rows or columns are hidden.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个对象，该对象指示是否隐藏行或列。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the rows or columns are hidden; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果隐藏行或列，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> control must span an entire column or row.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>控件必须跨越整个列或行。

trans-unit.source: You must access this property using the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.EntireRow%2A> or <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.EntireColumn%2A> property, for example `namedRange1.EntireRow.Hidden = true`.
trans-unit.target: 你必须访问此属性使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.EntireRow%2A>或<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.EntireColumn%2A>属性，例如`namedRange1.EntireRow.Hidden = true`。

trans-unit.source: Do not confuse this property with the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.FormulaHidden%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 将此属性与不混淆<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.FormulaHidden%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the horizontal alignment for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件的水平对齐方式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlHAlign" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlHAlign" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Some of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlHAlign> values might not be available to you, depending on the language support (U.S. English, for example) that you have selected or installed.
trans-unit.target: 某些<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlHAlign>值可能不是提供给你，具体取决于的语言支持 （美国美式英语）。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to set a variety of formatting and display characteristics of a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> control named `NamedRange1`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何设置各种不同的格式并显示特征<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>控件名为`NamedRange1`。

trans-unit.source: In particular, this example sets the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.HorizontalAlignment%2A> property to <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlHAlign.xlHAlignCenter> so that the contents of the range are centered horizontally within the bounds of each cell.
trans-unit.target: 具体而言，此示例设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.HorizontalAlignment%2A>属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlHAlign.xlHAlignCenter>以使每个单元格边界内水平居中的范围的内容。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Hyperlinks" /> collection that represents the hyperlinks in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Hyperlinks" /> 集合，该集合表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件中的超链接。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Hyperlinks" /> collection that represents the hyperlinks in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Hyperlinks" /> 集合，表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件中的超链接。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> and then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Hyperlinks%2A> property to add a hyperlink to the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>，然后使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Hyperlinks%2A>属性添加到超链接<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the identifying label for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control when the page is saved as a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 在将该页另存为网页时，获取或设置 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件的标识标签。

trans-unit.source: The identifying label for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control when the page is saved as a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 在将该页另存为网页时，<see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件的标识标签。

trans-unit.source: Using this property on a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> control that contains multiple cells will cause an exception to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性上<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>包含多个单元格的控件将导致异常引发。

trans-unit.source: You can use an ID label as a hyperlink reference in other HTML documents or on the same Web page.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用作为其他 HTML 文档中或在相同的网页上的超链接引用的 ID 标签。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> and then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.ID%2A> property to set an ID that will be used if the workbook is saved as a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>，然后使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.ID%2A>属性设置为 Web 页保存工作簿的情况下使用的 ID。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the indent level for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件的缩进级别。

trans-unit.source: The indent level for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件的缩进级别。

trans-unit.source: The indent level can be an integer from 0 to 15.
trans-unit.target: 缩进级别可以是从 0 到 15 的整数。

trans-unit.source: Using this property to set the indent level to a number less than 0 (zero) or greater than 15 causes an exception to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性将缩进级别设置为小于 0 （零） 的数或大于 15，将会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> and then uses the I<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.IndentLevel%2A> property to set the indent level of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> to 3.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>，然后使用 I<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.IndentLevel%2A>属性来设置缩进级别的<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>为 3。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> that represents the underlying native object for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" />，表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 的基础本机对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> that represents the underlying native object for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" />，表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 的基础本机对象。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.InnerObject%2A> property to access the underlying <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range?displayProperty=fullName> for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> and pass it to a method or property that expects a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range?displayProperty=fullName> passed as a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.InnerObject%2A>属性来访问基础<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range?displayProperty=fullName>为<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>并将其传递到方法或属性需要<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range?displayProperty=fullName>作为传递<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Programmatic Limitations of Host Items and Host Controls](/visualstudio/vsto/programmatic-limitations-of-host-items-and-host-controls.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[限制的主机项和主机控件编程](/visualstudio/vsto/programmatic-limitations-of-host-items-and-host-controls.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example starts a series of day names and then creates a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> to contain the series.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例启动一系列的星期几名称，然后创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>来包含该系列。

trans-unit.source: It then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range.AutoFill%2A> method to complete the series.
trans-unit.target: 然后，它使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range.AutoFill%2A>方法以完成序列。

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range.AutoFill%2A> requires a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range?displayProperty=fullName> as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range.AutoFill%2A> 需要<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range?displayProperty=fullName>作为参数。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Specifies which way to shift the cells.
trans-unit.target: 指定移动单元格的方向。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the following <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlInsertShiftDirection" /> values: <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlInsertShiftDirection.xlShiftToRight" /> or <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlInsertShiftDirection.xlShiftDown" />.
trans-unit.target: 可以是下列 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlInsertShiftDirection" /> 值之一：<see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlInsertShiftDirection.xlShiftToRight" /> 或 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlInsertShiftDirection.xlShiftDown" />。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, Microsoft Office Excel decides based on the shape of the range.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则 Microsoft Office Excel 基于该范围的形状进行确定。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlInsertFormatOrigin" /> values that specifies where to obtain the format to apply to the new cells.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlInsertFormatOrigin" /> 值之一，用于指定在何处获取要应用于新单元格的格式。

trans-unit.source: Inserts a cell or a range of cells into the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control and shifts other cells away to make space.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件中插入一个单元格或某一范围的单元格，并移走其他单元格以腾出空间。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets values in cells A1 through A3, and then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Insert%2A> method to insert a blank cell into a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> control named `NamedRange1` that is set to cell A1.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例通过 A3，A1 单元中设置值，然后使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Insert%2A>方法插入到空白单元格<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>控件名为`NamedRange1`是否设置为 A1 单元格。

trans-unit.source: This operation shifts the cells in the range down, which means that `NamedRange1` is now set to cell A2.
trans-unit.target: 此操作将范围中的单元格下，这意味着，`NamedRange1`现在设置为 A2 单元格。

trans-unit.source: To demonstrate this, the example sets the value of `NamedRange1` to `Raven`, which displays in cell A2.
trans-unit.target: 为了演示它，该示例设置的值`NamedRange1`到`Raven`，它会显示在单元格 A2。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: The amount to be added to the current indent.
trans-unit.target: 要添加到当前缩进的量。

trans-unit.source: Adds an indent to the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 向 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件添加缩进。

trans-unit.source: Using this method to set the indent level to a number less than 0 (zero) or greater than 15 causes an exception to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法将缩进级别设置为小于 0 （零） 的数或大于 15，将会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Use the<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.IndentLevel%2A> property to return the indent level for a range.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.IndentLevel%2A>属性以返回一系列的缩进级别。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>，然后使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.InsertIndent%2A>方法以设置缩进级别<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> that represents a range at an offset to the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" />，它表示距离 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件的某偏移量处的范围。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> that represents a range at an offset to the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" />，表示距离 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件的某偏移量处的范围。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Item%2A> property is intended to be used with the following parameters.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Item%2A>属性应与以下参数一起使用。

trans-unit.source: Parameter
trans-unit.target: 参数

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The index number of the cell you want to access, in order from left to right.
trans-unit.target: 单元格的索引号你想要访问，请按从左到右的顺序。

trans-unit.source: `NamedRange.Item(1)` returns the upper-left cell in the range; `NamedRange.Item(2)` returns the cell immediately to the right of the upper-left cell.
trans-unit.target: `NamedRange.Item(1)` 返回范围; 左上角单元格`NamedRange.Item(2)`左上角单元格右侧立即返回该单元格。

trans-unit.source: A number or string that indicates the column number of the cell you want to access, starting with either 1 or "A" for the first column in the range.
trans-unit.target: 数字或字符串，指示你想要访问，该单元格的列号开头 1 或"A"的范围中的第一列。

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to use <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Item%2A> without specifying any parameters, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Item%2A> will get a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange_ItemType> object that is part of the Visual Studio infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 如果你尝试使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Item%2A>而不指定任何参数，<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Item%2A>将获取<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange_ItemType>对象，是 Visual Studio 基础结构的一部分和不应在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: The `RowIndex` and `ColumnIndex` arguments are relative offsets.
trans-unit.target: `RowIndex`和`ColumnIndex`自变量是相对偏移量。

trans-unit.source: In other words, specifying a `RowIndex` of 1 returns cells in the first row of the range, not the first row of the worksheet.
trans-unit.target: 换而言之，指定`RowIndex`1 的范围不工作表中的第一行的第一行中返回的单元格。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> and then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Item%2A> property to select the cell that is offset from the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> by three columns and three rows.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>，然后使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Item%2A>属性以选择从偏移量的单元格<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>由三个列和三个行。

trans-unit.source: This version is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此版本用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: This version is for an application-level add-in.
trans-unit.target: 此版本用于针对应用程序级外接程序。

trans-unit.source: Rearranges the text in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control so that it fills the range evenly.
trans-unit.target: 重新排列 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件中的文本，以便它在该范围中均匀填充。

trans-unit.source: If the range is not large enough, Microsoft Office Excel displays a message telling you that text will extend below the range.
trans-unit.target: 如果范围不足够大，Microsoft Office Excel 会显示一消息，告知你文本将超出范围。

trans-unit.source: If you click the **OK** button, justified text will replace the contents in cells that extend beyond the selected range.
trans-unit.target: 如果你单击**确定**按钮，对齐的文本将替换中扩展到所选范围之外的单元格的内容。

trans-unit.source: To prevent this message from appearing, set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel._Application.DisplayAlerts%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 若要防止出现此消息，将设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel._Application.DisplayAlerts%2A>属性`false`。

trans-unit.source: After you set this property, text will always replace the contents in cells below the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> control.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性后，文本将始终替换下面的单元中的内容<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the distance from the left edge of column A to the left edge of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取从列 A 的左边缘到 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件的左边缘的距离。

trans-unit.source: The distance from the left edge of column A to the left edge of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 从列 A 的左边缘到 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件的左边缘的距离。

trans-unit.source: If the range is more than one column wide, the leftmost column in the range is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果该区域不超过一列的宽度，则使用的范围中最左边的列。

trans-unit.source: If the window is maximized, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Left%2A> returns a negative number that varies based on the width of the window border.
trans-unit.target: 如果该窗口最大化，<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Left%2A>返回一个负数，而异基于窗口边框的宽度。

trans-unit.source: Setting <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Left%2A> to 0 (zero) will make the window a tiny bit smaller than it would be if the application window were maximized.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Left%2A>为 0 （零） 将使窗口稍微小小于其应有应用程序窗口被最大化时。

trans-unit.source: In other words, if <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Left%2A> is 0 (zero), the left border of the main Microsoft Office Excel window will just barely be visible on the screen.
trans-unit.target: 换而言之，如果<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Left%2A>为 0 （零），Microsoft Office Excel 主窗口的左边的框仅能执行将在屏幕上可见。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>控件。

trans-unit.source: It then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Left%2A> and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Top%2A> properties to display the distance from the left edge of column A to the left edge of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>, and the distance from the top of row 1 to the top edge of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>.
trans-unit.target: 然后，它使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Left%2A>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Top%2A>属性，以显示从列 A 到左边缘的左边缘的距离<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>，以及按自上而下的行 1 到上边缘的距离<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>。

trans-unit.target: 然后，它使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.PivotTable%2A>， <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.LocationInTable%2A>， <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.PivotCell%2A>， <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.PivotItem%2A>，和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.PivotField%2A>要显示的布局的信息的属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>数据透视表中。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control is locked.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件是否处于锁定状态。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control is locked; <see langword="false" /> if the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control can be modified when the sheet is protected; <see langword="null" /> if the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control contains both locked and unlocked cells.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件处于锁定状态，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件可以在该表处于保护状态时进行修改，则为 <see langword="false" />；如果 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件中既包含处于锁定状态的单元格又包含处于未锁定状态的单元格，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the MDX name for the specified <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取指定的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 对象的 MDX 名称。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the MDX name for the specified <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 表示指定 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 对象的 MDX 名称的字符串。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to merge cells in each row of the specified range as separate merged cells.
trans-unit.target: 如果将指定范围中每一行中的单元格作为单独的合并单元格来合并，则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.target: 合并范围的值指定在左上角单元格中<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control contains merged cells.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control contains merged cells; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件包含合并单元格，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays the value of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.MergeArea%2A> and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.MergeCells%2A> properties of a single-cell <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> before and after using the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Merge%2A> method to merge a multiple-cell <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> that contains the single-cell <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例显示的值<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.MergeArea%2A>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.MergeCells%2A>的单单元格属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>之前和之后使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Merge%2A>方法合并多个单元格<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>包含单个单元格<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>.

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Name" /> object for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Name" /> 控件的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Name" /> object for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Name" /> 控件的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> and then displays the name in a message.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>，然后显示一条消息的名称。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the direction to navigate: <see langword="true" /> to navigate toward precedents; <see langword="false" /> to navigate toward dependents.
trans-unit.target: 指定导航方向：如果朝着引用单元格导航，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果朝着依赖单元格导航，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the arrow number to navigate; corresponds to the numbered reference in the cell's formula.
trans-unit.target: 指定要定位的箭头编号；与单元格公式中带编号的引用相对应。

trans-unit.source: If the arrow is an external reference arrow, this argument indicates which external reference to follow.
trans-unit.target: 如果该箭头是外部引用箭头，则此参数指示要遵循哪个外部引用。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, the first external reference is followed.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则遵循第一个外部引用。

trans-unit.source: Navigates a tracer arrow for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control to the precedent, dependent, or error-causing cell or cells.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件的跟踪标志箭头定位到引用单元格、依赖单元格或导致错误的单元格。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> object that represents the new selection.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示新选择的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Selects the precedent, dependent, or error cells.
trans-unit.target: 选择引用单元格、 相关或错误的单元格。

trans-unit.source: This method causes an error if it is applied to a cell without visible tracer arrows.
trans-unit.target: 如果应用于没有可见追踪箭头的单元格，则此方法会导致错误。

trans-unit.target: 可选参数
