trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example makes cell A1 a dependent of a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使 A1 单元格的从属<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>。

trans-unit.source: The example then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.ShowDependents%2A> method to draw an arrow between the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> and the dependent cell, and calls the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.NavigateArrow%2A> method to select the dependent cell.
trans-unit.target: 然后该示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.ShowDependents%2A>方法之间绘制一个箭头<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>从属单元格，并调用和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.NavigateArrow%2A>方法来选择依赖的单元格。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> that represents the next cell.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个表示下一个单元格的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> that represents the next cell.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示下一个单元格的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" />。

trans-unit.source: This property emulates the TAB key, although the property returns the next cell without selecting it.
trans-unit.target: 此属性模拟 TAB 键，但该属性返回的下一个单元而不选择它。

trans-unit.source: On a protected sheet, this property returns the next unlocked cell.
trans-unit.target: 对于受保护的表，此属性返回的下一步解锁单元格。

trans-unit.source: On an unprotected sheet, this property always returns the cell immediately to the right of the specified cell.
trans-unit.target: 在未受保护的工作表，此属性始终返回该单元格立即指定的单元格右侧。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> and then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Next%2A> property to select the cell to the right of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>，然后使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Next%2A>属性来选择右侧的单元格<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: The text to add to the note (up to 255 characters).
trans-unit.target: 要添加到说明中的文本（最多 255 个字符）。

trans-unit.source: The text is inserted starting at position <c>Start</c>, replacing <c>Length</c> characters of the existing note.
trans-unit.target: 该文本将从 <c>Start</c> 位置处开始插入，并替换现有注释的 <c>Length</c> 个字符。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, this method returns the current text of the note starting at position <c>Start</c>, for <c>Length</c> characters.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则此方法将返回该注释中从 <c>Start</c> 位置开始的 <c>Length</c> 个字符的当前文本。

trans-unit.source: The starting position for the text that is set or returned.
trans-unit.target: 所设置或返回的文本的起始位置。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, this method starts at the first character.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则此方法将从第一个字符开始。

trans-unit.source: To append text to the note, specify a number larger than the number of characters in the existing note.
trans-unit.target: 若要向该注释追加文本，请指定一个比现有注释中字符数大的数字。

trans-unit.source: The number of characters to be set or returned.
trans-unit.target: 要设置或返回的字符数。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, Microsoft Office Excel sets or returns characters from the starting position to the end of the note (up to 255 characters).
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则 Microsoft Office Excel 将设置或返回从注释的起始位置到末尾的字符（最多 255 个字符）。

trans-unit.source: If there are more than 255 characters from <c>Start</c> to the end of the note, this method returns only 255 characters.
trans-unit.target: 如果从注释的 <c>Start</c> 到末尾有 255 个以上的字符，则此方法只返回 255 个字符。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the cell note associated with the cell in the upper-left corner of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件左上角中的单元格相关联的单元格注释。

trans-unit.source: Cell notes have been replaced by range comments.
trans-unit.target: 单元格说明已替换为范围注释。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Comment> object.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Comment>对象。

trans-unit.source: To add a note that contains more than 255 characters, use this method once to specify the first 255 characters, and then use it again to append the remainder of the note (no more than 255 characters at a time).
trans-unit.target: 若要添加包含超过 255 个字符的注释，使用此方法一次并将检索指定的前 255 个字符，然后再次使用它要追加的说明 （一次不超过 255 个字符） 的其余部分。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to set a variety of formatting and display characteristics of a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> control named `NamedRange1`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何设置各种不同的格式并显示特征<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>控件名为`NamedRange1`。

trans-unit.source: In particular, this example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.NoteText%2A> method to add a note to `NamedRange1` with the text `This is a Formatting test`.
trans-unit.target: 具体而言，此示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.NoteText%2A>方法添加到注释`NamedRange1`与文本`This is a Formatting test`。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the format code for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件的格式代码。

trans-unit.source: The format code for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件的格式代码。

trans-unit.source: This property returns `null` if all cells in the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> control do not have the same number format.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回`null`如果中的所有单元格<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>控件不具有相同的数字格式。

trans-unit.source: The format code is the same string as the **Format Codes** option in the **Format Cells** dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 格式代码是相同的字符串**格式代码**选项**设置单元格格式**对话框。

trans-unit.source: The `Format` function uses different format code strings than do the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.NumberFormat%2A> and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.NumberFormatLocal%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: `Format`函数使用不同的格式代码字符串比<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.NumberFormat%2A>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.NumberFormatLocal%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.NumberFormat%2A> property to format a date string in a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.NumberFormat%2A>属性来设置格式的日期字符串<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>。

trans-unit.source: The example also uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.NumberFormatLocal%2A> property to display the date format in the language of the user.
trans-unit.target: 此示例还使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.NumberFormatLocal%2A>属性中的用户的语言显示的日期格式。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the format code for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control in the language of the user.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件的采用用户语言的格式代码。

trans-unit.source: The format code for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control in the language of the user.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件的采用用户语言的格式代码。

trans-unit.source: The `Format` function uses different format code strings than do the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.NumberFormat%2A> and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.NumberFormatLocal%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: `Format`函数使用不同的格式代码字符串比<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.NumberFormat%2A>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.NumberFormatLocal%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.NumberFormat%2A> property to format a date string in a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.NumberFormat%2A>属性来设置格式的日期字符串<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>。

trans-unit.source: The example also uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.NumberFormatLocal%2A> property to display the date format in the language of the user.
trans-unit.target: 此示例还使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.NumberFormatLocal%2A>属性中的用户的语言显示的日期格式。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> that is offset from the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" />，它表示距离 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件的偏移量。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> that is offset from the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" />，表示距离 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件的偏移量。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Offset%2A> property is intended to be used with the following parameters.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Offset%2A>属性应与以下参数一起使用。

trans-unit.source: Parameter
trans-unit.target: 参数

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The number of rows (positive, negative, or 0 (zero)) by which the range is to be offset.
trans-unit.target: 行 （正数、 负数还是 0 （零）） 数的范围是偏移。

trans-unit.source: Positive values are offset downward, and negative values are offset upward.
trans-unit.target: 表示向下偏移正值和负值表示向上偏移。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 0。

trans-unit.source: The number of columns (positive, negative, or 0 (zero)) by which the range is to be offset.
trans-unit.target: 列 （正数、 负数还是 0 （零）） 数的范围是偏移。

trans-unit.source: Positive values are offset to the right, and negative values are offset to the left.
trans-unit.target: 在右侧偏移正值和负值表示向左侧偏移。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 0。

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to use <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Offset%2A> without specifying any parameters, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Offset%2A> will get a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange_OffsetType> object that is part of the Visual Studio infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 如果你尝试使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Offset%2A>而不指定任何参数，<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Offset%2A>将获取<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange_OffsetType>对象，是 Visual Studio 基础结构的一部分和不应在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> and then adds text to a cell offset from the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> by three columns and three cells.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>，然后将文本添加到单元格偏移量从<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>由三个列和三个单元格。

trans-unit.source: This version is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此版本用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: This version is for an application-level add-in.
trans-unit.target: 此版本用于针对应用程序级外接程序。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text orientation.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置文本方向。

trans-unit.source: An integer value in the range of -90 to 90 degrees.
trans-unit.target: 位于 -90 至 90 度范围中的整数值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> and then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Orientation%2A> property to display vertical text in the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>，然后使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Orientation%2A>属性显示在垂直文本<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current outline level of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件的当前大纲级别。

trans-unit.source: The current outline level of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件的当前大纲级别。

trans-unit.source: Level one is the outermost summary level.
trans-unit.target: 级别 1 是最外层的摘要级别。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the location of a page break.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置分页符的位置。

trans-unit.source: The location of a page break.
trans-unit.target: 分页符的位置。

trans-unit.source: You can set this property using one of the following <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlPageBreak>values:
trans-unit.target: 你可以设置此属性使用以下项之一<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlPageBreak>值：

trans-unit.source: This property can return the location of either automatic or manual page breaks, but it can only set the location of manual breaks (it can only be set to <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlPageBreak.xlPageBreakManual> or <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlPageBreak.xlPageBreakNone>).
trans-unit.target: 此属性可以返回的位置是自动还是手动上的分页符，但它仅可以将手动换页符的位置进行设置 (它只能设置为<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlPageBreak.xlPageBreakManual>或<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlPageBreak.xlPageBreakNone>)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> and then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.PageBreak%2A> property to set a page break at the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>，然后使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.PageBreak%2A>属性设置在分页符<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets the parent object of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件的父对象。

trans-unit.source: The parent object of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件的父对象。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> and then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Parent%2A> property to display the name of the parent <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Worksheet> of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>，然后使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Parent%2A>属性显示的父级名称<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Worksheet>的<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains left and right brackets to indicate where the cells should be split.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，包含指示应在何处拆分单元格的左中括号和右中括号。

trans-unit.source: For example, "<c>[xxx][xxx]</c>" would insert the first three characters into the first column of the destination range, and it would insert the next three characters into the second column.
trans-unit.target: 例如，“<c>[xxx][xxx]</c>”会在目标范围的第一列中插入前三个字符，并在第二列中插入随后的三个字符。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, Microsoft Office Excel guesses where to split the columns based on the spacing of the top left cell in the range.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则 Microsoft Office Excel 基于该范围中左上角单元格的间距猜测在何处拆分列。

trans-unit.source: If you want to use a different range to guess the parse line, use a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> object as the <c>ParseLine</c> argument.
trans-unit.target: 如果要使用另一个范围来猜测分析行，请将 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> 对象用作 <c>ParseLine</c> 参数。

trans-unit.source: That range must be one of the cells that is being parsed.
trans-unit.target: 该范围必须是正被分析的那些单元格之一。

trans-unit.source: The <c>ParseLine</c> argument cannot be longer than 255 characters, including the brackets and spaces.
trans-unit.target: <c>ParseLine</c> 参数不能超过 255 个字符，包括括号和空格。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> object that represents the upper-left corner of the destination range for the parsed data.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> 对象，表示所分析数据的目标范围的左上角。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, Excel parses in place.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则 Excel 就地分析。

trans-unit.source: Parses a range of data and breaks it into multiple cells.
trans-unit.target: 分析某一范围的数据并将它分成多个单元格。

trans-unit.source: Distributes the contents of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> control to fill several adjacent columns.
trans-unit.target: 将分发的内容<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>控件填充多个相邻的列。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> control can be no more than one column wide.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>控件均可以是不能超过一列的宽度。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Parse%2A> method to parse each group of digits in a set of telephone numbers from a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> control named `NamedRange1` into a new range of cells starting at cell D1.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Parse%2A>方法，以便分析每个组中的电话号码从一组数字的<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>控件名为`NamedRange1`到单元格从单元格 D1 开始新的范围。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: The part of the range to be pasted.
trans-unit.target: 该范围中要粘贴的部分。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the following <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlPasteType" /> values:
trans-unit.target: 可以是下列 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlPasteType" /> 值之一：

trans-unit.source: The paste operation.
trans-unit.target: 粘贴操作。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the following <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlPasteSpecialOperation" /> values:
trans-unit.target: 可以是下列 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlPasteSpecialOperation" /> 值之一：

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to not have blank cells in the range on the Clipboard pasted into the destination range.
trans-unit.target: 如果不将剪贴板上该范围中的空单元格粘贴到目标范围，则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to transpose rows and columns when the range is pasted.
trans-unit.target: 如果在粘贴该范围时对行和列进行转置，则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Pastes the contents of a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> object from the Clipboard into the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 将剪贴板上 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> 对象的内容粘贴到 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件中。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Copy%2A> method to copy the contents of a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> control named `NamedRange1` to the Clipboard, and then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.PasteSpecial%2A> method to paste these contents into a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> control named `NamedRange2`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Copy%2A>方法的内容复制<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>控件名为`NamedRange1`到剪贴板，然后使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.PasteSpecial%2A>方法以粘贴到这些内容<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>控件名为`NamedRange2`.

trans-unit.source: The `Operation` parameter is set to <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlPasteSpecialOperation.xlPasteSpecialOperationAdd> so that the content of each cell in `NamedRange1` is added to the corresponding cell in `NamedRange2`.
trans-unit.target: `Operation`参数设置为<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlPasteSpecialOperation.xlPasteSpecialOperationAdd>，以便在每个单元格的内容`NamedRange1`添加到中的相应单元格`NamedRange2`。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Phonetic" /> object, which contains information about a specific phonetic text string in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Phonetic" /> 对象，该对象包含有关 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件中特定拼音文本字符串的信息。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Phonetic" /> object, which contains information about a specific phonetic text string in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Phonetic" /> 对象，包含有关 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件中特定拼音文本字符串的信息。

trans-unit.source: This property provides compatibility with earlier versions of Microsoft Office Excel.
trans-unit.target: 此属性提供与早期版本的 Microsoft Office Excel 的兼容性。

trans-unit.source: You should use <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Phonetics%2A>(`index`), where `index` is the index number of the phonetic text, to return a single <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Phonetic> object.
trans-unit.target: 应使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Phonetics%2A>(`index`)，其中`index`是要返回单个的拼音文本的索引号<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Phonetic>对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Phonetics" /> collection of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Phonetics" /> 控件的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 集合。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Phonetics" /> collection of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Phonetics" /> 控件的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 集合。

trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.PivotCell" />，它表示数据透视表中的一个单元格。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.PivotCell" /> that represents a cell in a PivotTable report.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.PivotCell" />，表示数据透视表中的一个单元格。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a PivotTable report and a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> inside the area of the PivotTable report.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建数据透视表和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>内的数据透视表的区域。

trans-unit.source: It then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.PivotTable%2A>, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.LocationInTable%2A>, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.PivotCell%2A>, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.PivotItem%2A>, and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.PivotField%2A> properties to display information about the placement of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> within the PivotTable report.
trans-unit.target: 然后，它使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.PivotTable%2A>， <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.LocationInTable%2A>， <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.PivotCell%2A>， <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.PivotItem%2A>，和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.PivotField%2A>要显示的布局的信息的属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>数据透视表中。

trans-unit.source: The example also uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Group%2A> method to perform numeric grouping based on the first value in the field.
trans-unit.target: 此示例还使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Group%2A>方法来执行数值分组基于字段中的第一个值。

trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.PivotItem" />，表示包含 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件左上角的数据透视表项。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.PivotTable" /> that represents the PivotTable report containing the upper left corner of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control, or the PivotTable report associated with the PivotChart report.

trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> that represents all the precedents of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" />，它表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件的所有引用单元格。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> that represents all the precedents of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" />，表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件的所有引用单元格。

trans-unit.source: This can be a multiple selection (a union of <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range?displayProperty=fullName> objects) if there is more than one precedent.
trans-unit.target: 这可以是多重选择 (的并集<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range?displayProperty=fullName>对象) 如果存在多个引用单元格。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets a reference in cell A2 to refer to cell A1, and then sets a reference in a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> to refer to cell A2.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例设置单元格 A2 来引用单元格 A1 中的引用，然后设置的引用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>来引用单元格 A2。

trans-unit.source: The code example then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Precedents%2A> property to select the precedents of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>, which are cells A1 and A2.
trans-unit.target: 然后，该代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Precedents%2A>属性选择的引用单元格<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>，这是单元格 A1 和 A2。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets the prefix character for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件的前缀字符。

trans-unit.source: The prefix character for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件的前缀字符。

trans-unit.source: If the value of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel._Application.TransitionNavigKeys%2A> property is `false`, this prefix character is ' for a text label, or blank.
trans-unit.target: 如果值<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel._Application.TransitionNavigKeys%2A>属性是`false`，此前缀字符是对于文本标签，或为空。

trans-unit.source: If the value of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel._Application.TransitionNavigKeys%2A> property is `true`, this character is ' for a left-justified label, " for a right-justified label, ^ for a centered label, \ for a repeated label, or blank.
trans-unit.target: 如果值<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel._Application.TransitionNavigKeys%2A>属性是`true`，该字符是左对齐的标签，"右对齐的标签，^ 的居中添加 \ 重复的标签，标签或留空。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.PrefixCharacter%2A> property to display the prefix character for a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.PrefixCharacter%2A>属性显示的前缀字符<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> that represents the previous cell.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个表示上一个单元格的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> that represents the previous cell.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示上一个单元格的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" />。

trans-unit.source: This property emulates pressing SHIFT+TAB; unlike the key combination, however, the property returns the previous cell without selecting it.
trans-unit.target: 此属性会模拟按下 SHIFT + TAB;与不同的键的组合，但是，该属性返回上一个单元格而不选择它。

trans-unit.source: On a protected sheet, this property returns the previous unlocked cell.
trans-unit.target: 对于受保护的表，此属性返回上一个解锁单元格。

trans-unit.source: On an unprotected sheet, this property always returns the cell immediately to the left of the specified cell.
trans-unit.target: 在未受保护的工作表，此属性始终返回该单元格立即指定的单元格左侧。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> and then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Previous%2A> property to select the cell to the left of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>，然后使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Previous%2A>属性选择该单元格左侧<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: The number of the first page to start printing.
trans-unit.target: 要开始打印的起始页的页码。

trans-unit.source: By default, printing starts at the beginning.
trans-unit.target: 默认从第一页开始打印。

trans-unit.source: The number of the last page to print.
trans-unit.target: 要打印的最后一页的页码。

trans-unit.source: By default, printing ends at the last page.
trans-unit.target: 默认在打印完最后一页后停止打印。

trans-unit.source: The number of copies to print.
trans-unit.target: 要打印的份数。

trans-unit.source: By default, one copy is printed.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，只打印一份。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to have Excel invoke print preview before printing the object.
trans-unit.target: 如果让 Excel 在打印对象之前调用打印预览，则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> (or omitted) to print the object immediately.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="false" />（或省略）时，立即打印对象。

trans-unit.source: Sets the name of the active printer.
trans-unit.target: 设置活动打印机的名称。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to print to a file.
trans-unit.target: 若要打印到文件，请使用 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: If <c>PrToFileName</c> is not specified, Excel prompts the user to enter the name of the output file.
trans-unit.target: 若未指定 <c>PrToFileName</c>，则 Excel 会提示用户输入输出文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to collate multiple copies.
trans-unit.target: 若逐份打印多个副本，请使用 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: If <c>PrintToFile</c> is set to <see langword="true" />, this argument specifies the name of the file you want to print to.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>PrintToFile</c> 设为 <see langword="true" />，则此参数指定要打印到的文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: Prints the object.
trans-unit.target: 打印对象。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that represents a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 对象的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.PrintOutEx%2A> method to print one copy of the first two pages of the named range `NamedRange1` to the default printer.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.PrintOutEx%2A>方法要打印一份命名范围的前两页`NamedRange1`到默认打印机。

trans-unit.source: To run this code example, your workbook must contain a worksheet named `Sheet1` with a named range named `NamedRange1` that covers a range of cells that contain some data.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，你的工作簿必须包含名为工作表`Sheet1`与名为的命名区域`NamedRange1`中包含的单元格包含一些数据区域。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to enable changes while print preview is displayed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在显示打印预览时启用所做的更改，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Shows a preview of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control as it would look when printed.
trans-unit.target: 显示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件的预览（显示打印时的外观）。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: 可选。

trans-unit.source: Array of indices of the columns that contain the duplicate values.
trans-unit.target: 包含重复值的列的索引数组。

trans-unit.source: If blank, all columns will be searched for duplicate information.
trans-unit.target: 如果为空，将对所有列搜索重复信息。

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: 可选。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the first row contains header information.
trans-unit.target: 指定第一行中是否包含标题信息。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="xlNo" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="xlNo" />。

trans-unit.source: Use <see langword="xlGuess" /> if you want Excel to attempt to determine the header.
trans-unit.target: 如果想让 Excel 尝试确定标题，请使用 <see langword="xlGuess" />。

trans-unit.source: Removes duplicate values from a range of values.
trans-unit.target: 从某一范围的值中移除重复值。

trans-unit.source: Removes subtotals from the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 从 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件中移除小计。

trans-unit.source: The string you want Microsoft Office Excel to search for.
trans-unit.target: 希望 Microsoft Office Excel 搜索的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The replacement string.
trans-unit.target: 替换字符串。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the following <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlLookAt" /> constants: <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlLookAt.xlWhole" /> or <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlLookAt.xlPart" />.
trans-unit.target: 可以是下列 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlLookAt" /> 常数之一：<see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlLookAt.xlWhole" /> 或 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlLookAt.xlPart" />。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the following <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlSearchOrder" /> constants: <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlSearchOrder.xlByRows" /> or <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlSearchOrder.xlByColumns" />.
trans-unit.target: 可以是下列 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlSearchOrder" /> 常数之一：<see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlSearchOrder.xlByRows" /> 或 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlSearchOrder.xlByColumns" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to make the search case sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 如果在搜索时区分大小写，则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: You can use this argument only if you have selected or installed double-byte language support in Excel.
trans-unit.target: 仅当已在 Excel 中选择或安装双字节语言支持时，才会用到此参数。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to have double-byte characters match only double-byte characters; <see langword="false" /> to have double-byte characters match their single-byte equivalents.
trans-unit.target: 如果让双字节字符仅与双字节字符相匹配，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果让双字节字符与其单字节等效字符相匹配，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The search format for the method.
trans-unit.target: 该方法的搜索格式。

trans-unit.source: The replace format for the method.
trans-unit.target: 该方法的替换格式。

trans-unit.source: Replaces the specified characters in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control with a new string.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件中指定的字符替换为新字符串。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified characters are in cells within the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的字符位于 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件中的单元格中，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Using this method does not change either the selection or the active cell.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法不会更改选定内容或活动的单元格。

trans-unit.source: The settings for `LookAt`, `SearchOrder`, `MatchCase`, and `MatchByte` are saved each time you use this method.
trans-unit.target: 有关设置`LookAt`， `SearchOrder`， `MatchCase`，和`MatchByte`保存每次使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify values for these arguments the next time you call the method, the saved values are used.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不指定这些参数的值在调用该方法的下一步时，将使用保存的值。

trans-unit.source: Setting these arguments changes the settings in the **Find** dialog box, and changing the settings in the **Find** dialog box changes the saved values that are used if you omit the arguments.
trans-unit.target: 设置这些参数将更改中的设置**查找**对话框中，并更改中的设置**查找**对话框中更改如果省略这些参数，则使用的已保存的值。

trans-unit.source: To avoid problems, set these arguments explicitly each time you use this method.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免出现问题，这些自变量显式设置每次使用此方法。

trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the value of the cells in a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> control to the string "`This is a sentence.`", and then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Replace%2A> method to replace the substring "`a`" with "`my`".
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例设置中的单元格的值<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>到字符串的控件"`This is a sentence.`"，然后使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Replace%2A>方法将子字符串"`a`"与"`my`"。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets a resized <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> based on the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个基于 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> 控件调整大小的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" />。

trans-unit.source: A resized <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> based on the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个基于 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> 控件调整大小的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Resize%2A> property is intended to be used with the following parameters.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Resize%2A>属性应与以下参数一起使用。

trans-unit.source: Parameter
trans-unit.target: 参数

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The number of rows in the new range.
trans-unit.target: 新的范围中的行数。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, the number of rows in the range remains the same.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，该范围中的行数保持不变。

trans-unit.source: The number of columns in the new range.
trans-unit.target: 新的范围中的列数。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, the number of columns in the range remains the same.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，该范围中的列数保持不变。

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to use <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Resize%2A> without specifying any parameters, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Resize%2A> will get a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange_ResizeType> object that is part of the Visual Studio infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 如果你尝试使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Resize%2A>而不指定任何参数，<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Resize%2A>将获取<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange_ResizeType>对象，是 Visual Studio 基础结构的一部分和不应在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.target: 然后，该代码选择新的范围。

trans-unit.source: The number of the first row of the first area in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件的第一个区域中第一行的编号。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> and uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Column%2A> and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Row%2A> properties to display the numbers of the first column and row in the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>并使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Column%2A>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Row%2A>属性，以显示第一列数和行中<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: A single cell to compare with the other cells in the row.
trans-unit.target: 要与该行中的其他单元格进行比较的单个单元格。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> object that represents all the cells whose contents are different from those of the comparison cell in each row.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> 对象，该对象表示内容与每一行中的比较单元格不同的所有单元格。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> object that represents all the cells whose contents are different from those of the comparison cell in each row.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> 对象，表示内容与每一行中的比较单元格不同的所有单元格。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> and populates cells in the range with three different values.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>并填充具有三个不同值的范围中的单元格。

trans-unit.source: It compares all of the cells in the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> with the value of cell B5, which is 22, and selects the cells that contain values that do not match.
trans-unit.target: 它比较中的单元格的所有<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>B5 单元格，为 22，然后选择包含不匹配的值的单元格的值。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height of all the rows in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control, measured in points.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件中所有行的高度（以磅为度量单位）。

trans-unit.source: The height of all the rows in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control, measured in points.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件中所有行的高度（以磅为度量单位）。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="null" /> if the rows in the specified range are not all the same height.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定范围中的行高不尽相同，则返回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: For a single row, the value of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Height%2A> property is equal to the value of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.RowHeight%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 对于单个行的值<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Height%2A>属性等于的值<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.RowHeight%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: However, you can also use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Height%2A> property to return the total height of a range of cells.
trans-unit.target: 但是，你还可以使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Height%2A>属性以返回一系列单元格的总高度。

trans-unit.source: Other differences between <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.RowHeight%2A> and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Height%2A> include the following:
trans-unit.target: 其他差异<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.RowHeight%2A>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Height%2A>如下：

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Height%2A> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Height%2A> 为只读。

trans-unit.source: If you return the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.RowHeight%2A> property of several rows, you will get either the row height of each of the rows (if all the rows are the same height) or `null` (if they are different heights).
trans-unit.target: 如果返回<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.RowHeight%2A>的多个行的属性，你将获取的每个行的行高度 （如果所有行的高度相同） 或`null`（如果它们是不同的高度）。

trans-unit.source: If you return the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Height%2A> property of several rows, you will get the total height of all the rows.
trans-unit.target: 如果返回<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Height%2A>的多个行的属性，将获取所有行的总高度。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> and then sets the width of the columns and the height of the rows that are part of the range.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>，然后设置列的宽度和范围的一部分的行的高度。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> that represents one or more rows in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" />，它表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件中的一行或多个行。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> that represents one or more rows in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" />，它表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件中的一行或多个行。

trans-unit.source: When used without parameters, this property returns a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range> object that contains all the rows in the named range.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用不带参数，此属性返回<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range>对象，其中包含指定范围中的所有行。

trans-unit.source: This property can be used with the following optional parameters to get specific rows in the named range.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可以使用以下可选参数，用于获取指定范围中的特定行。

trans-unit.source: If you use this property with parameters, the return value is an object that must be cast to a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range>.
trans-unit.target: 如果参数中使用此属性，返回值是必须强制转换为对象<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range>。

trans-unit.source: Parameter
trans-unit.target: 参数

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The index of one or more rows to get.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取的一个或多个行的索引。

trans-unit.source: To get a single row, pass an integer that specifies the index of the row you want to get.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取单个行，请传递一个整数，指定你想要获取的行的索引。

trans-unit.source: The row indexes begin at 1.
trans-unit.target: 从 1 开始的行索引。

trans-unit.source: To get multiple contiguous rows, pass a string with the format "`first row`:`last row`".
trans-unit.target: 若要获取多个连续行，请传递与格式字符串"`first row`:`last row`"。

trans-unit.source: For example, to get rows 1 through 5, pass "1:5".
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要获取行 1 至 5，可传递"1:5"。

trans-unit.source: Do not use this parameter.
trans-unit.target: 不使用此参数。

trans-unit.source: This property will throw a <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException> if you try to pass a value to this parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此属性将引发<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException>如果你尝试将值传递给此参数。

trans-unit.target: 获取可以在 Microsoft Office SharePoint 服务器上对 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 对象执行的操作。

trans-unit.target: <c>Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Actions</c>对象，表示可以在 SharePoint 服务器执行的操作<see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" />对象。

trans-unit.source: Creates <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Phonetic" /> objects for all the cells in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Phonetic" /> 控件中的所有单元格创建 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Any existing <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Phonetic> objects in the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> control are automatically overwritten (deleted) by the new objects you add using this method.
trans-unit.target: 任何现有<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Phonetic>中的对象<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>控件都会自动覆盖 （删除） 通过使用此方法添加的新对象。

trans-unit.source: Scrolls through the contents of the active window to move the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control into view.
trans-unit.target: 在活动窗口的内容中滚动，以便将 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件移到视图中。

trans-unit.source: The range must consist of a single cell in the active document.
trans-unit.target: 范围必须包含的活动文档中的单个单元格。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to remove one level of tracer arrows to direct dependents; <see langword="false" /> to expand one level of tracer arrows.
trans-unit.target: 如果移除指向直接依赖单元格的某一级别的跟踪标志箭头，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果展开某一级别的跟踪标志箭头，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Draws tracer arrows to the direct dependents of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 绘制指向 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件的直接依赖单元格的跟踪标志箭头。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> control must be a single cell.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>控件必须为单个单元格。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使 A1 单元格的从属<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>。

trans-unit.source: The example then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.ShowDependents%2A> method to draw an arrow between the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> and the dependent cell, and calls the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.NavigateArrow%2A> method to select the dependent cell.
trans-unit.target: 然后该示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.ShowDependents%2A>方法之间绘制一个箭头<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>从属单元格，并调用和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.NavigateArrow%2A>方法来选择依赖的单元格。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an object that indicates whether the outline is expanded for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control (so that the detail of the column or row is visible).
trans-unit.target: 获取和设置一个对象，该对象指示是否展开了 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件的大纲（以便列或行的详细信息可见）。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the outline is expanded for the specified range (so that the detail of the column or row is visible); otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果展开指定范围的大纲（以便列或行的详细信息可见），则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> control must contain a single summary column or row in an outline.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>控件必须包含单个摘要列或概述中的行。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> control is in a PivotTable report, this property is set to `true` if the item is showing detail.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>控件位于数据透视表中，此属性设置为`true`如果项显示详细信息。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> control is not in a PivotTable report, the following statements are true:
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>控件不在数据透视表，以下语句为 true:

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> control must be in a single summary row or column.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>控件必须为单个摘要行或列中。

trans-unit.source: This property returns `false` if any of the children of the row or column are hidden.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回`false`如果任何行或列的子级处于隐藏状态。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property to `true` is equivalent to showing all the children of the summary row or column.
trans-unit.target: 此属性设置为`true`等效于显示的摘要行或列的所有子级。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property to `false` is equivalent to hiding all the children of the summary row or column.
trans-unit.target: 此属性设置为`false`等效于隐藏摘要行或列的所有子级。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> control is in a PivotTable report, it is possible to set this property for more than one cell at a time.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>控件位于数据透视表中，可以一次设置此属性对于多个单元格。

trans-unit.source: This property can be returned only if the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> control is a single cell.
trans-unit.target: 可以返回此属性，仅当<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>控件是单个单元格。

trans-unit.source: Draws tracer arrows through the precedents tree to the cell that is the source of the error, and returns the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> object that contains that cell.
trans-unit.target: 绘制通过引用单元格树指向作为错误源的单元格的跟踪标志箭头，然后返回包含该单元格的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> object that contains the cell that is the source of the error.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> 对象，包含作为错误源的单元格。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to remove one level of tracer arrows to direct precedents; <see langword="false" /> to expand one level of tracer arrows.
trans-unit.target: 如果移除指向直接引用单元格的某一级别的跟踪标志箭头，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果展开某一级别的跟踪标志箭头，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Draws tracer arrows to the direct precedents of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 绘制指向 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件的直接引用单元格的跟踪标志箭头。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> control must be a single cell.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>控件必须为单个单元格。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example makes cell A1 a precedent of a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使 A1 单元格的引用单元格<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>。

trans-unit.source: The example then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.ShowPrecedents%2A> method to draw an arrow between the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> and the precedent cell.
trans-unit.target: 然后该示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.ShowPrecedents%2A>方法之间绘制一个箭头<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>和引用单元格。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether text automatically shrinks to fit in the available column width.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示文本是否自动缩小以适合可用的列宽。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if text automatically shrinks to fit in the available column width; <see langword="null" /> if this property is not set to the same value for all cells in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 如果文本自动收缩以适应可用的列宽，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果对于 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件中所有的单元格，未将此属性设置为同一个值，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The first sort field, as either text (a range name) or a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> object ("Dept" or <c>Cells(1, 1)</c>, for example).
trans-unit.target: 第一个排序字段，要么是文本（范围名称），要么是一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> 对象（例如，“Dept”或 <c>Cells(1, 1)</c>）。

trans-unit.source: The sort order for the field or range specified in <c>Key1</c>.
trans-unit.target: 在 <c>Key1</c> 中指定的字段或范围的排序顺序。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the following <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlSortOrder" /> values:
trans-unit.target: 可以是下列 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlSortOrder" /> 值之一：

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlSortOrder.xlDescending" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlSortOrder.xlDescending" />。

trans-unit.source: Sorts <c>Key1</c> in descending order.
trans-unit.target: 将 <c>Key1</c> 按降序排序。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlSortOrder.xlAscending" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlSortOrder.xlAscending" />。

trans-unit.source: Sorts <c>Key1</c> in ascending order.
trans-unit.target: 将 <c>Key1</c> 按升序排序。

trans-unit.source: The second sort field, as either text (a range name) or a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 第二个排序字段，要么是文本（范围名称），要么是一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: If you omit this argument, there is no second sort field.
trans-unit.target: 如果您省略此参数，则没有第二个排序字段。

trans-unit.source: Specifies which elements are to be sorted.
trans-unit.target: 指定要进行排序的元素。

trans-unit.source: Use this argument only when sorting PivotTable reports.
trans-unit.target: 只有当对数据透视表进行排序时，才使用此参数。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the following <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlSortType" /> values:
trans-unit.target: 可以是下列 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlSortType" /> 值之一：

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlSortType.xlSortLabels" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlSortType.xlSortLabels" />。

trans-unit.source: Sorts the PivotTable report by labels.
trans-unit.target: 按标签对数据透视表进行排序。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlSortType.xlSortValues" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlSortType.xlSortValues" />。

trans-unit.source: Sorts the PivotTable report by values.
trans-unit.target: 按值对数据透视表进行排序。

trans-unit.source: The sort order for the range specified in <c>Key2</c>.
trans-unit.target: 在 <c>Key2</c> 中指定的范围的排序顺序。

trans-unit.source: Cannot be used when sorting PivotTable reports.
trans-unit.target: 不可用于数据透视表的排序。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the following <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlSortOrder" /> values:
trans-unit.target: 可以是下列 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlSortOrder" /> 值之一：

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlSortOrder.xlDescending" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlSortOrder.xlDescending" />。

trans-unit.source: Sorts <c>Key2</c> in descending order.
trans-unit.target: 将 <c>Key2</c> 按降序排序。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlSortOrder.xlAscending" />。

trans-unit.source: Sorts <c>Key2</c> in ascending order.
trans-unit.target: 将 <c>Key2</c> 按升序排序。

trans-unit.target: 第三个排序字段，要么是文本（范围名称），要么是一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> 对象。

trans-unit.target: 如果您省略此参数，则没有第三个排序字段。

trans-unit.target: 不可用于数据透视表的排序。

trans-unit.target: 在 <c>Key3</c> 中指定的字段或范围的排序顺序。

trans-unit.source: Cannot be used when sorting PivotTable reports.
trans-unit.target: 不可用于数据透视表的排序。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the following <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlSortOrder" /> values:

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlSortOrder.xlDescending" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlSortOrder.xlDescending" />。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlSortOrder.xlAscending" />。

trans-unit.source: Sorts <c>Key3</c> in ascending order.

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether or not the first row contains headers.
trans-unit.target: 指定第一行中是否包含标题。

trans-unit.source: Cannot be used when sorting PivotTable reports.
trans-unit.target: 不可用于数据透视表的排序。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the following <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlYesNoGuess" /> values:
trans-unit.target: 可以是下列 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlYesNoGuess" /> 值之一：

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlYesNoGuess.xlGuess" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlYesNoGuess.xlGuess" />。

trans-unit.source: Let Microsoft Office Excel determine whether there is a header, and to determine where it is, if there is one.
trans-unit.target: 让 Microsoft Office Excel 确定是否有标题，如果有的话，确定它的位置。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlYesNoGuess.xlNo" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlYesNoGuess.xlNo" />。

trans-unit.source: (The entire range should be sorted).
trans-unit.target: （应当对整个范围进行排序。）

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlYesNoGuess.xlYes" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlYesNoGuess.xlYes" />。

trans-unit.source: (The entire range should not be sorted).
trans-unit.target: （不应当对整个范围进行排序。）

trans-unit.source: This argument is a one-based integer offset to the list of custom sort orders.
trans-unit.target: 此参数是一个在自定义排序顺序列表中的从 1 开始的整数偏移量。

trans-unit.source: If you omit <c>OrderCustom</c>, a normal sort is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略 <c>OrderCustom</c>，则使用正常排序。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to do a case-sensitive sort; <see langword="false" /> to do a sort that is not case sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 如果执行区分大小写的排序，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果执行不区分大小写的排序，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Cannot be used when sorting PivotTable reports.
trans-unit.target: 不可用于数据透视表的排序。

trans-unit.source: The sort orientation.
trans-unit.target: 排序方向。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the following <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlSortOrientation" /> values:
trans-unit.target: 可以是下列 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlSortOrientation" /> 值之一：

trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlSortOrientation.xlSortRows" />。

trans-unit.source: Sorts by row.
trans-unit.target: 按行排序。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlSortOrientation.xlSortColumns" />。

trans-unit.source: Sorts by column.
trans-unit.target: 按列排序。

trans-unit.source: The type of sort.
trans-unit.target: 排序的类型。

trans-unit.source: The settings for `Header`, `Order1`, `Order2`, `Order3`, `OrderCustom`, and `Orientation` are saved, for the particular worksheet, each time you use this method.
trans-unit.target: 有关设置`Header`， `Order1`， `Order2`， `Order3`， `OrderCustom`，和`Orientation`保存后，特定的工作表，每次使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify values for these arguments the next time you call the method, the saved values are used.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不指定这些参数的值在调用该方法的下一步时，将使用保存的值。

trans-unit.source: Set these arguments explicitly each time you use this method, if you choose not to use the saved values.
trans-unit.target: 这些自变量显式设置每次使用此方法，如果你选择不使用保存的值。

trans-unit.source: Text strings that are not convertible to numeric data are sorted normally.
trans-unit.target: 通常排序不可转换为数值数据的文本字符串。

trans-unit.source: If no arguments are defined with this method, Microsoft Office Excel will sort the selection in ascending order.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用此方法定义没有自变量，Microsoft Office Excel 会进行排序以升序所选内容。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlSortOrder.xlDescending" />。

trans-unit.target: 将 <c>Key2</c> 按降序排序。

trans-unit.source: Sorts <c>Key2</c> in ascending order.
trans-unit.target: 将 <c>Key2</c> 按升序排序。

trans-unit.source: The third sort field, as either text (a range name) or a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> object.

trans-unit.source: If you omit <c>OrderCustom</c>, normal sort order is used.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to do a case-sensitive sort; <see langword="false" /> to do a sort that is not case sensitive.

trans-unit.source: Uses East Asian sorting methods to sort the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用东亚排序方法对 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件进行排序。

trans-unit.target: 例如，在日语中，按照假名音节表顺序进行排序。

trans-unit.source: If no arguments are defined with this method, Microsoft Office Excel sorts the selection in ascending order.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用此方法定义没有自变量，Microsoft Office Excel 对进行排序以升序所选内容。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.SortSpecial%2A> method to sort a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> using Pin Yin (phonetic Chinese sort order for characters).

trans-unit.source: To sort Chinese characters, this example assumes the user has Chinese language support for Microsoft Office Excel.
trans-unit.target: 若要对中文字符进行排序，此示例假定用户具有中文语言支持 Microsoft Office excel。

trans-unit.source: Excel will default to sorting the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> by value if the user does not have Chinese language support.
trans-unit.target: Excel 将默认为排序<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>通过如果用户不具有中文语言支持的值。

trans-unit.target: 朗读方向（按行或列）。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> will cause formulas to be sent to the Text-To-Speech (TTS) engine for cells that have formulas.
trans-unit.target: 对于包含公式的单元格，如果为 <see langword="true" />，则会导致将公式发送到文字语音转换 (TTS) 引擎。

trans-unit.source: The value is sent if the cells do not have formulas; <see langword="false" /> (default) will cause values to always be sent to the TTS engine.
trans-unit.target: 如果单元格中没有公式，则发送该值；如果为 <see langword="false" />（默认值），则会导致总是将该值发送到 TTS 引擎。

trans-unit.source: Causes the cells of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control to be spoken in row order or column order.

trans-unit.target: 使用数据表通过更改某些常量值在工作表中，若要查看如何影响其他单元格中的值执行假设分析。

trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> 对象，指定 Microsoft Office Excel 将在何处放置结果。

trans-unit.source: If the range is larger than a single cell, the top left cell is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果范围大于单个单元格，则使用左上角的单元格。

trans-unit.source: The format of the text to be split into columns.
trans-unit.target: 要拆分成多列的文本的格式。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the following <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlTextParsingType" /> constants:
trans-unit.target: 可以是下列 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlTextParsingType" /> 常量之一：

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlTextParsingType.xlDelimited" /> (default)
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlTextParsingType.xlDelimited" />（默认值）

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the following <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlTextQualifier" /> values:
trans-unit.target: 可以是下列 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlTextQualifier" /> 值之一：

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlTextQualifier.xlTextQualifierDoubleQuote" /> (default)
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlTextQualifier.xlTextQualifierDoubleQuote" />（默认值）

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to have Excel consider consecutive delimiters as one delimiter.
trans-unit.target: 如果让 Excel 将连续分隔符视为一个分隔符，则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to have <c>DataType</c> be <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlTextParsingType.xlDelimited" /> and to have the tab character be a delimiter.
trans-unit.target: 如果让 <c>DataType</c> 为 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlTextParsingType.xlDelimited" />，并将制表符用作分隔符，则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to have <c>DataType</c> be <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlTextParsingType.xlDelimited" /> and to have the semicolon be a delimiter.
trans-unit.target: 如果让 <c>DataType</c> 为 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlTextParsingType.xlDelimited" />，并将分号用作分隔符，则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to have <c>DataType</c> be <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlTextParsingType.xlDelimited" /> and to have the comma be a delimiter.
trans-unit.target: 如果让 <c>DataType</c> 为 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlTextParsingType.xlDelimited" />，并将逗号用作分隔符，则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to have <c>DataType</c> be <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlTextParsingType.xlDelimited" /> and to have the space character be a delimiter.
trans-unit.target: 如果让 <c>DataType</c> 为 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlTextParsingType.xlDelimited" />，并将空格字符用作分隔符，则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to have <c>DataType</c> be <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlTextParsingType.xlDelimited" /> and to have the character specified by the <c>OtherChar</c> argument be a delimiter.
trans-unit.target: 如果让 <c>DataType</c> 为 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlTextParsingType.xlDelimited" />，并且将 <c>OtherChar</c> 参数指定的字符用作分隔符，则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The delimiter character when <c>Other</c> is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 当 <c>Other</c> 为 <see langword="true" /> 时的分隔符字符。

trans-unit.source: If more than one character is specified, only the first character of the string is used; the remaining characters are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了多个字符，则只使用该字符串的第一个字符；忽略其余字符。

trans-unit.source: An array containing parse information for the individual columns of data.
trans-unit.target: 一个数组，包含各个数据列的分析信息。

trans-unit.source: The interpretation depends on the value of <c>DataType</c>.
trans-unit.target: 解释取决于 <c>DataType</c> 的值。

trans-unit.source: When the data is delimited, this argument is an array of two-element arrays, with each two-element array specifying the conversion options for a particular column.
trans-unit.target: 当对数据进行分隔时，此参数是一个由两元素数组组成的数组，每个两元素数组都指定特定列的转换选项。

trans-unit.source: The first element is the column number (1-based), and the second element is one of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlColumnDataType" /> constants specifying how the column is parsed.
trans-unit.target: 第一个元素是列号（从 1 开始），第二个元素是指定如何分析列的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlColumnDataType" /> 常量之一。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the following <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlColumnDataType" /> values:
trans-unit.target: 可以是下列 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlColumnDataType" /> 值之一：

trans-unit.source: You can use <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlColumnDataType.xlEMDFormat" /> only if Taiwanese language support is installed and selected.
trans-unit.target: 仅当已安装和选择繁体中文支持时，才会用到 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlColumnDataType.xlEMDFormat" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlColumnDataType.xlEMDFormat" /> specifies that Taiwanese era dates are being used.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlColumnDataType.xlEMDFormat" /> 指定要使用的繁体中文纪元日期。

trans-unit.source: The column specifiers can be in any order.
trans-unit.target: 列说明符可以采用任何顺序。

trans-unit.source: If a given column specifier is not present for a particular column in the input data, the column is parsed with the <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlColumnDataType.xlGeneralFormat" /> setting.
trans-unit.target: 如果对于输入数据中的特定列，给定的列说明符不存在，则用 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlColumnDataType.xlGeneralFormat" /> 设置对列进行分析。

trans-unit.source: If the source data has fixed-width columns, the first element of each two-element array specifies the starting character position in the column (as an integer; 0 (zero) is the first character).
trans-unit.target: 如果源数据具有固定宽度的列，则每个两元素数组中的第一个元素都指定该列中的起始字符位置（以整数形式指定；0（零）是第一个字符）。

trans-unit.source: The second element of the two-element array specifies the parse option for the column as a number from 1 through 9, as listed above.
trans-unit.target: 两元素数组的第二个元素将该列的分析选项指定为从 1 至 9 的数字，如上面列出的那样。

trans-unit.source: The decimal separator that Excel uses when recognizing numbers.
trans-unit.target: Excel 用于识别数字的小数点分隔符。

trans-unit.source: The default setting is the system setting.

trans-unit.source: The thousands separator that Excel uses when recognizing numbers.

trans-unit.source: Numbers that begin with a minus character.

trans-unit.source: Gets the distance, in points, from the top edge of row 1 (one) to the top edge of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.

trans-unit.source: The distance, in points, from the top edge of row 1 (one) to the top edge of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> control is more than one row high, the top (lowest numbered) row in the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> control is used.
