trans-unit.source: It then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Left%2A> and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Top%2A> properties to display the distance from the left edge of column A to the left edge of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>, and the distance from the top of row 1 to the top edge of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>.
trans-unit.target: 然后，它使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Left%2A>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Top%2A>属性，以显示从列 A 到左边缘的左边缘的距离<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>，以及按自上而下的行 1 到上边缘的距离<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Promotes the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control in an outline (that is, decreases its outline level).
trans-unit.target: 提升大纲中的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件（即，降低它的大纲级别）。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> control must be a row or column, or a range of rows or columns.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>控件必须为行或列或行或列的范围。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> control is in a PivotTable report, this method ungroups the items contained in the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> control.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>控件位于数据透视表中，此方法中包含的项取消分组<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>控件。

trans-unit.source: Separates a merged area into individual cells.
trans-unit.target: 将一个合并区域分成多个单元格。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the row height of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control equals the standard height of the sheet.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件的行高是否等于此表的标准高度。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the row height of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control equals the standard height of the sheet; <see langword="null" /> if the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control contains more than one row and the rows are not all the same height.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件的行高等于该表的标准高度，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件包含多行，而且这些行的高度不尽相同，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the column width of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control equals the standard width of the sheet.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件的列宽是否等于此表的标准宽度。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the column width of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control equals the standard width of the sheet; <see langword="null" /> if the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control contains more than one column and the columns are not all the same width.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件的列宽等于该表的标准宽度，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件包含多列，而且这些列的宽度不尽相同，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Validation" /> object that represents data validation for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Validation" /> 对象，该对象表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件的数据验证。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Validation" /> object that represents data validation for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Validation" /> 对象，表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件的数据验证。

trans-unit.source: You must use the Startup event handler of a worksheet to add validation to a named range.
trans-unit.target: 你必须使用工作表的启动事件处理程序将验证添加到命名范围。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the Startup event handler, see [Events in Office Projects](/visualstudio/vsto/events-in-office-projects.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关启动事件处理程序的详细信息，请参阅[Office 项目中的事件](/visualstudio/vsto/events-in-office-projects.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Validation%2A> property to verify that a string with at least three characters is entered into a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Validation%2A>属性以验证至少三个字符的字符串输入到<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>。

trans-unit.source: The `SetValidation` method must be called from the Startup event handler.
trans-unit.target: `SetValidation`必须从启动事件处理程序调用方法。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件的值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Value%2A> property can be used with the following optional parameters.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Value%2A>属性可以用于以下可选参数。

trans-unit.source: If you specify the optional parameters, you must use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.set_Value%2A> and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.get_Value%2A> accessors in Visual Basic and C#.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定可选的参数，则必须使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.set_Value%2A>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.get_Value%2A>Visual Basic 和 C# 中的访问器。

trans-unit.source: Parameter
trans-unit.target: 参数

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlRangeValueDataType> values that specifies the data type of the range value.
trans-unit.target: 用于指定范围值数据类型的 <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlRangeValueDataType> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlRangeValueDataType.xlRangeValueDefault>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlRangeValueDataType.xlRangeValueDefault>。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> 控件的值。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is used only with the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.set_Value%2A> accessor.
trans-unit.target: 此参数仅用于<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.set_Value%2A>访问器。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Value%2A> property with and without the optional parameters.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Value%2A>属性具有和没有可选的参数。

trans-unit.source: This version is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此版本用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: This version is for an application-level add-in.
trans-unit.target: 此版本用于针对应用程序级外接程序。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件的值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件的值。

trans-unit.source: The only difference between this property and the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Value%2A> property is that <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Value2%2A> is not a parameterized property.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的唯一区别和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Value%2A>属性是<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Value2%2A>不是参数化的属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Value2%2A> property to set the value of a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> to a value obtained from the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.AutoComplete%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Value2%2A>属性设置的值<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>为从获取值<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.AutoComplete%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the vertical alignment of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件的垂直对齐方式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlVAlign" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlVAlign" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Some of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlVAlign> values might not be available to you, depending on the language support (U.S. English, for example) that you have selected or installed.
trans-unit.target: 某些<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlVAlign>值可能不是提供给你，具体取决于的语言支持 （美国美式英语）。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to set a variety of formatting and display characteristics of a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> control named `NamedRange1`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何设置各种不同的格式并显示特征<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>控件名为`NamedRange1`。

trans-unit.source: In particular, this example sets the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.VerticalAlignment%2A> property to <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlVAlign.xlVAlignCenter> so that the contents of the range are centered vertically within the bounds of each cell.
trans-unit.target: 具体而言，此示例设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.VerticalAlignment%2A>属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlVAlign.xlVAlignCenter>以使每个单元格边界内的该范围的内容垂直居中。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets the width of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control in points.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件的宽度（以磅为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The width of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control in points.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件的宽度（以磅为单位）。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>，然后使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Width%2A>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.Height%2A>要显示的宽度和高度属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Worksheet" /> that represents the worksheet that contains the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Worksheet" />，它表示包含 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件的工作表。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Worksheet" /> that represents the worksheet that contains the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Worksheet" />，表示包含 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件的工作表。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例显示包含的工作表的名称<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether Microsoft Office Excel wraps the text in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 Microsoft Office Excel 是否对 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件中的文本进行换行。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if Excel wraps the text in the object; <see langword="null" /> if the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control contains some cells that wrap text and other cells that do not wrap text.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Excel 对该对象中的文本进行换行，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件包含一些对文本进行换行的单元格，还包含一些不对文本进行换行的单元格，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Excel will change the row height of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> control, if necessary, to accommodate the text in the range.
trans-unit.target: Excel 将更改的行高度<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>控制，如有必要，以适应范围中的文本。

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XPath" /> that represents the Xpath of the element mapped to the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XPath" />，它表示映射到 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件的元素的 Xpath。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XPath" /> that represents the Xpath of the element mapped to the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XPath" />，表示映射到 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange" /> 控件的元素的 Xpath。

trans-unit.source: XML features, except for saving files in the XML Spreadsheet format, are available only in Microsoft Office Professional Edition 2003 and Microsoft Office Excel 2003.
trans-unit.target: XML 功能，除了将文件保存 XML 电子表格格式，将仅在 Microsoft Office Professional Edition 2003 和 Microsoft Office Excel 2003 中可用。

trans-unit.source: The following code example maps an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XmlMap> to the current workbook, and then sets the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.XPath%2A> property of a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> to an XPath defined in the XmlMap.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例地图<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XmlMap>到当前工作簿，然后设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.XPath%2A>属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>到 XmlMap 中定义的 XPath。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that an Excel Schema Definition file named Customers.xsd that contains the XPath definition "/ns1:Customer/ns1:LastName" exists at the root of the C directory.
trans-unit.target: 此示例假定 Excel 架构定义文件名 Customers.xsd 包含 XPath 定义为"/ ns1:Customer / ns1:LastName"位于 C 目录的根目录。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。
